AI.method: 通过分析四名国际学生在烹饪任务中的互动，采用Jeffersonian转录法和序列分析笑声。
AI.findings: 笑声能缓解威胁面子的行为，重新定义共同目标，并在不明确讨论的情况下解决冲突。
AI.theory_contributions: 扩展了笑声在互动中的多层面作用，强调其在规范重构中的角色。
AI.practical_contributions: 为实际互动中如何利用笑声解决冲突和调整目标提供了启示。

title: Dispatch Optimization for Ambulance and Emergency Service Systems
affiliations: University of Michigan at Ann Arbor - Department of Industrial and Operations Engineering, Hong Kong University of Science & Technology (HKUST) and Hong Kong University of Science & Technology (HKUST) - Department of Information Systems, Business Statistics and Operations Management

detail.title: Dispatch Optimization for Ambulance and Emergency Service Systems

declarations.declarationOfInterest: There are no personal or financial conflicts of interest related to this work.

detail.abstract: Emergency Medical Services (EMS) face critical challenges in optimizing ambulance dispatch policies to minimize response times and operational costs, particularly under nonstationary demand processes across multiple service classes. Traditional static dispatch strategies, such as deploying the nearest available unit, often lead to suboptimal resource allocation and coverage gaps during high-demand periods, especially when dealing with varying emergency call priorities and service requirements. Existing approaches largely focus on stationary demand models or rely on computationally intensive methods such as Markov decision processes that are impractical for large-scale systems. This paper addresses these limitations by proposing a dynamic dispatch framework that adapts to real-time demand fluctuations and system states, offering a scalable solution to enhance EMS efficiency in time-varying environments with heterogeneous service types. We introduce two simple heuristic policies: a static policy derived from a deterministic linear program with buffer capacity and a dynamic policy that adjusts dispatch probabilities using real-time information. Both approaches explicitly account for multiple service classes with distinct response time requirements and resource consumption patterns. Theoretical analysis shows that these policies achieve asymptotic optimality gaps of O(θ-1/2 log 1/2 θ) and O(θ-2/3 log θ), respectively, where θ is a system size-scaling parameter. We further extend our framework to accommodate i) high-variance demand patterns that cannot be adequately represented by traditional Bernoulli processes, and ii) light traffic regime, and we show that all the results extend to these settings as well. Numerical experiments demonstrate that our proposed solutions perform very well compared to existing methods, particularly under nonstationary demand patterns and complicated systems. These results highlight the practical viability of adaptive dispatch controls in improving EMS performance while balancing computational efficiency and theoretical rigor.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种动态调度框架，优化急救医疗服务（EMS）的救护车调度策略，以应对非平稳需求和多服务类别的挑战。通过静态和动态启发式策略，实现了理论上的渐进最优性，并在数值实验中验证了其优于现有方法的性能。
AI.research_question: 如何设计一种动态调度框架，以优化EMS救护车调度策略，适应非平稳需求和多服务类别的复杂环境？
AI.motivation: 传统静态调度策略在非平稳需求和多服务类别下表现不佳，现有方法局限于平稳需求模型或计算复杂度高，亟需一种高效且可扩展的解决方案。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于确定性线性规划和实时信息调整的动态调度策略，理论分析表明其渐进最优性。
AI.method: 提出静态和动态两种启发式策略，并通过数值实验验证其性能。
AI.findings: 所提策略在非平稳需求和多服务类别下表现优异，理论分析支持其渐进最优性。
AI.theory_contributions: 证明了动态调度策略的渐进最优性，并扩展至高方差需求和轻流量场景。
AI.practical_contributions: 为EMS提供了一种高效且可扩展的调度解决方案，显著提升了响应效率和资源利用率。

title: Sustainable Management Strategies for Ecosystem Services in Coastal Cities: Driving Mechanisms of Ecosystem Services Supply and Demand Relationships Based on G-Xgboost Model
affiliations: affiliation not provided to SSRN, affiliation not provided to SSRN, Shandong University of Science and Technology, affiliation not provided to SSRN, affiliation not provided to SSRN and affiliation not provided to SSRN

detail.title: Sustainable Management Strategies for Ecosystem Services in Coastal Cities: Driving Mechanisms of Ecosystem Services Supply and Demand Relationships Based on G-Xgboost Model
detail.abstract: Under the dual pressures of urbanization and climate change, the supply-demand imbalance of ecosystem services (ESs) in coastal cities has become increasingly pronounced, posing a critical challenge to regional sustainable development. Clarifying the driving mechanisms behind ESs supply-demand relationships (ESSDR) and formulating sustainable management strategies accordingly are essential for achieving the supply-demand balance of ESs. Taking Qingdao as a case study, this research quantified six types of ESs—food production, water yield, marine aquaculture, carbon sequestration, soil retention, and recreational capacity—over the period from 2002 to 2022. On this basis, an innovative Geographical-XGBoost (G-XGBoost) model was employed to investigate the spatial heterogeneity of influencing factors across different geographical units. This approach revealed the underlying driving mechanisms of ESSDR in coastal cities and informed the development of spatially targeted strategies for sustainable ESs management. The results indicate that: (1) The urban core and southern coastal areas are major deficit zones in Qingdao, while the northern agricultural areas and mountainous regions are surplus zones. (2) From 2002 to 2022, urban expansion emerged as the primary driving force of ESSDR in coastal cities. Significant spatial interactions exist between the built-up land proportion (BLP) and factors such as cultivated land proportion (CLP), potential evapotranspiration (PET), and distance to ports (DTP). When BLP exceeds 30%, the negative impacts of urban expansion are significantly intensified under conditions where CLP is below 40%, or PET exceeds 1000 mm, or DTP is less than 20 km. (3) The impact of these influencing factors on ESSDR differs across different geographical units. Accordingly, region-specific management strategies were proposed based on the dominant factors in each area. These findings provide both a technical framework and theoretical foundation for the precise formulation of ESs sustainable management strategies in coastal cities globally.

AI.tldr: 研究通过G-XGBoost模型分析了青岛2002-2022年生态系统服务供需关系的驱动机制，并提出区域化管理策略。
AI.research_question: 沿海城市生态系统服务供需关系（ESSDR）的驱动机制是什么？如何制定可持续管理策略以实现供需平衡？
AI.motivation: 在城市化与气候变化的双重压力下，沿海城市生态系统服务供需失衡问题日益突出，亟需明确驱动机制并制定管理策略。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于地理单元的空间异质性分析，结合G-XGBoost模型揭示驱动机制。
AI.method: 量化六类生态系统服务，运用G-XGBoost模型分析影响因素的空间异质性。
AI.findings: 1. 青岛城市核心区与南部沿海为赤字区，北部农业区与山区为盈余区；2. 城市扩张是主要驱动因素，与耕地比例等因素存在空间交互作用；3. 不同地理单元的影响因素差异显著。
AI.theory_contributions: 为全球沿海城市生态系统服务管理提供了技术框架与理论基础。
AI.practical_contributions: 提出了基于主导因子的区域化管理策略，支持精准制定可持续管理措施。

title: Route Icing Risk Modelling for Arctic Marine Operations: A Predictive Framework for Enhanced Operational Planning
affiliations: UiT The Arctic University of Norway, affiliation not provided to SSRN and affiliation not provided to SSRN

detail.title: Route Icing Risk Modelling for Arctic Marine Operations: A Predictive Framework for Enhanced Operational Planning
detail.abstract: Ship operations in the Arctic face significant challenges from icing, particularly during winter seasons. Icing on vessel surfaces poses serious risks, including reduced stability that can lead to capsizing in the worst case. The International Maritime Organization (IMO)’s Polar Code mandates that ship operators assess and mitigate icing risks during operational planning. However, the absence of specific route risk models or metrics hinders effective implementation of these regulations. This study introduces a route icing risk model to estimate the spatial-temporal icing risk of Arctic voyages, leveraging existing icing rate prediction models and weather forecasts. Using actual ship trip data and reanalysis weather data from 2021 to 2023, the study identifies severe icing thresholds for the estimation of severe icing events. Ten ship trips were analysed to compare route icing risk predictions based on forecast data versus reanalysis data, revealing significant discrepancies. The study also examines the effects of route discretization intervals, speed changes, and waypoint adjustments on route icing risk estimation. Results indicate that larger discretization intervals may underestimate risk, while waypoint deviations have a greater impact on icing risk than speed adjustments. Both factors have limited influence when arrival times are fixed comparing with arrival time not fixed. A case study demonstrates the model’s application for multi-objective fishing route optimization, balancing icing risk, trip duration, and catch maximization. This model provides a valuable tool for risk-informed decision-making, accident prevention, and regulatory compliance in Arctic marine operations.

AI.tldr: 本研究提出了一种北极航线结冰风险模型，结合天气预测和实际航行数据，为船舶操作提供风险决策工具。
AI.research_question: 如何量化北极航线中的结冰风险，以支持船舶操作的风险评估和决策？
AI.motivation: 北极船舶操作中结冰问题严重，但缺乏具体的航线风险模型，导致国际海事组织的规定难以有效实施。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于现有结冰率预测模型和天气数据，构建空间-时间结冰风险模型。
AI.method: 利用2021-2023年的实际航行数据和再分析天气数据，分析严重结冰事件的阈值，并比较预测数据与再分析数据的差异。
AI.findings: 较大的离散化间隔可能低估风险，航点调整对结冰风险的影响大于速度调整。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了北极航线结冰风险的量化模型，填补了现有研究的空白。
AI.practical_contributions: 为北极船舶操作提供了风险决策工具，支持多目标优化（如风险、航程时间和捕捞量）。

title: From Micro to Macro: Can Machines Unlock New Real-Time Economic Signals from Firm-Level Accounting Data?
affiliations: Central University of Finance and Economics (CUFE) - School of Economics and Central University of Finance and Economics (CUFE) - School of Economics

detail.title: From Micro to Macro: Can Machines Unlock New Real-Time Economic Signals from Firm-Level Accounting Data?
detail.abstract: This paper investigates whether machines can unlock new real-time economic signals from firm-level accounting data. We develop the Firm-level Accounting data-based Machine Learning (FAML) framework, which applies machine learning algorithms directly to firm-level corporate financial reports to nowcast aggregate economic output. Unlike "aggregate-then-nowcast" approaches, which average firm-level variables into market or sector aggregates, or "factor-then-nowcast" methods, which extract common factors via dynamic factor models, our FAML method operates on the full set of firm-level accounting variables, retaining the informational detail embedded in firm-level heterogeneity and cross-firm interactions while minimizing information loss. Empirically, the FAML framework reduces root mean squared error by over 70% relative to a random walk benchmark and consistently outperforms both aggregation- and factor-based methods. Variable importance analysis further shows that accounting data from the industrials, utilities, and consumer discretionary sectors are particularly informative for economic output nowcasting. These findings underscore the value of leveraging machine learning to transform micro-level accounting data into timely macroeconomic insights.

AI.tldr: 本文探讨了机器是否能从企业级会计数据中提取新的实时经济信号，提出了FAML框架，直接利用机器学习算法对企业财务报告进行宏观经济预测，效果显著优于传统方法。
AI.research_question: 机器能否通过企业级会计数据提取新的实时经济信号？
AI.motivation: 传统方法（如聚合或因子提取）可能导致信息损失，而FAML框架旨在保留企业级异质性和跨企业交互的信息细节。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于企业级会计数据的机器学习框架（FAML），强调保留微观数据的详细信息。
AI.method: 直接应用机器学习算法对企业级财务报告进行分析，避免聚合或因子提取。
AI.findings: FAML框架的预测误差比随机游走基准降低70%以上，优于传统方法；工业、公用事业和消费行业数据对预测特别有用。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了一种新的机器学习框架，强调微观数据在宏观经济预测中的价值。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者和市场参与者提供了更准确的实时经济预测工具。

detail.abstract: Passive liquidity providers (LPs) in automated market makers (AMMs) face losses due to adverse selection (LVR), which static trading fees often fail to offset in practice. We study the key determinants of LP profitability in a dynamic reduced-form model where an AMM operates in parallel with a centralized exchange (CEX), traders route their orders optimally to the venue offering the better price, and arbitrageurs exploit price discrepancies. Using large-scale simulations and real market data, we analyze how LP profits vary with market conditions such as volatility and trading volume, and characterize the optimal AMM fee as a function of these conditions. We highlight the mechanisms driving these relationships through extensive comparative statics, and confirm the model's relevance through market data calibration. A key trade-off emerges: fees must be low enough to attract volume, yet high enough to earn sufficient revenues and mitigate arbitrage losses. We find that under normal market conditions, the optimal AMM fee is competitive with the trading cost on the CEX and remarkably stable, whereas in periods of very high volatility, a high fee protects passive LPs from severe losses. These findings suggest that a threshold-type dynamic fee schedule is both robust enough to market conditions and improves LP outcomes.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了自动做市商（AMM）中被动流动性提供者（LPs）的盈利能力，分析了市场波动性和交易量对LP收益的影响，并提出了动态费用调整策略以优化LP收益。
AI.research_question: 在AMM与中心化交易所（CEX）并行的市场中，被动流动性提供者（LPs）的盈利能力如何受市场条件（如波动性和交易量）的影响？
AI.motivation: 被动流动性提供者（LPs）在AMM中因逆向选择（LVR）而面临损失，而静态交易费用往往无法弥补这些损失。本文旨在探索如何通过动态费用调整优化LP收益。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于动态简化模型，结合AMM与CEX并行市场的假设，分析LP收益与市场条件的关系。
AI.method: 通过大规模模拟和真实市场数据，分析LP收益与市场波动性、交易量的关系，并确定最优AMM费用。
AI.findings: 在正常市场条件下，最优AMM费用与CEX交易成本相当且稳定；在高波动时期，高费用可保护LPs免受严重损失。动态费用调整策略能显著改善LP收益。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了动态费用调整的理论框架，揭示了市场条件与LP收益的关系。
AI.practical_contributions: 为AMM设计者提供了动态费用调整策略，以优化LP收益并应对市场波动。

title: Which Factors Influence Physicians’ Decision-Making Towards Resuscitation Attitudes? A Vignette-Based Study
affiliations: affiliation not provided to SSRN, Institute of Social and Preventive Medicine (IUMSP), Lausanne University Hospital , affiliation not provided to SSRN, University of Lausanne - Lausanne University Hospital and affiliation not provided to SSRN

detail.title: Which Factors Influence Physicians’ Decision-Making Towards Resuscitation Attitudes? A Vignette-Based Study
detail.abstract: Aim: To identify physician and patient characteristics influencing physicians’ resuscitation decision-making.Methods: Monocentric, experimental vignette study in a tertiary university hospital, using a self-report online vignette questionnaire. Each questionnaire contained eleven demographic questions and five clinical vignettes. Three vignettes had one variable altered between two groups and two vignettes were identical in the two groups. Participants were physicians working in hospital wards admitting adult, somatic patients. Physicians were randomly assigned to one of the two groups and had to decide for a resuscitation in case of a cardiac arrest.Results: 303 out of 724 physicians (41.8%) from 18 wards responded. Physicians from surgery departments were significantly (p<0.001) more likely to resuscitate than those from the medicine department in four vignettes (multimorbidity, oncology, dementia and neurology vignettes). Physicians with an experience in ICU were significantly (p<0.05) less likely to recommend resuscitation in three vignettes (multimorbidity, oncology and dementia vignettes). Two patient variables were significantly (p<0.001) associated with a decision to resuscitate: patient being a physician themself vs. not (33.1% vs. 15.8%); patient of younger age vs. older (61.5% vs. 25.5%) despite a terminally ill condition. Participants overall were more likely to resuscitate in comparison with expert advice in four vignettes (multimorbidity, oncology, dementia and neurology vignettes).Conclusions: Physicians’ own characteristics contribute to heterogeneity in decision-making. Physicians’ resuscitation attitudes are influenced by patient factors that may not be related to resuscitation outcomes. These results raise important ethical considerations and highlight the need for specific training about resuscitation outcomes and reflexiveness in decision-making.

title: Polarization Image Enhancement Method Based on Federated Learning
affiliations: Capital Normal University and Capital Normal University

detail.title: Polarization Image Enhancement Method Based on Federated Learning
detail.abstract: Polarized images have significant application value in optical research and computer vision. Collaborative training of polarized images can effectively integrate multi-source data and enhance the generalization ability and performance of models. However, due to the fact that these data are usually distributed across multiple devices and have high privacy sensitivity, such as distributed devices or terminals equipped with polarized cameras, direct central training may face the risk of data leakage and insufficient privacy protection. To address this issue, this paper proposes a polarization image enhancement method based on federated learning to effectively safeguard data privacy. To optimize the model aggregation in the federated learning framework, a loss-weighted aggregation strategy is designed, combining multi-source information from each client to construct a global model for distributed low-light image enhancement. Experiments conducted on two real-world datasets demonstrate that the proposed method not only significantly reduces training time but also outperforms traditional centralized methods in terms of privacy protection.To ensure reproducibility, the source code and demonstration videos can be found at https://pan.baidu.com/s/1dzWMZgnGYl92uyabAkfhXQ (Extraction code: zs6h).

title: How and Why Students Use Ai Chatbots in Economics Classes: Evidence from Student Surveys
affiliations: affiliation not provided to SSRN and Whitman College

detail.title: How and Why Students Use Ai Chatbots in Economics Classes: Evidence from Student Surveys
detail.abstract: While much has been written about what AI chatbots can do, very little has been written about how students actually use them in economics classes. The purpose of this paper is to investigate how and why economics students use AI chatbots, and to better understand if AI chatbot usage prevents students from learning. To do this we draw on a structured questionnaire as well as class discussions with students. We find that 1) the majority of students use AI chatbots to help them learn, 2) the majority of students know how to use AI appropriately, and, 3) students’ fear that AI will produce inaccurate information and their desire to learn are the primary deterrents to using AI chatbots inappropriately. Based on these results, we discuss some implications for instructors to consider when developing their AI chatbot policies.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了经济学学生如何使用AI聊天机器人及其对学习的影响，发现大多数学生能正确使用AI，且学习动机和对AI信息准确性的担忧是主要约束因素。
AI.research_question: 经济学学生如何以及为何使用AI聊天机器人？AI聊天机器人是否阻碍学生学习？
AI.motivation: 尽管关于AI聊天机器人能力的讨论很多，但对其在经济学课堂中的实际使用情况研究较少。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于学生对AI的使用行为和态度分析。
AI.method: 采用结构化问卷和课堂讨论。
AI.findings: 1. 多数学生用AI辅助学习；2. 多数学生能正确使用AI；3. 学生对AI信息准确性的担忧和学习动机是主要约束。
AI.theory_contributions: 揭示了学生对AI的实际使用模式及其影响因素。
AI.practical_contributions: 为教师制定AI聊天机器人政策提供了建议。

title: Accountability Among Child Protection Workers: Definitions, Perceived Impacts, and Coping Strategies
affiliations: University of Montreal, University of Montreal and University of Montreal

detail.title: Accountability Among Child Protection Workers: Definitions, Perceived Impacts, and Coping Strategies
detail.abstract: BackgroundIn Quebec, Canada, child protection (CP) services operate within a complex system that places significant responsibility on child protection workers (CPWs). Tasked with decisions that profoundly affect children and families, CPWs must remain accountable for their actions. This accountability requirement can heighten vulnerability, contributing to stress and compassion fatigue. Despite its central role in CP practice, accountability remains poorly defined in the scientific literature, with limited insight into its impact on CPWs' daily work.ObjectiveThis study examines Quebec CPWs’ experience of accountability by exploring (1) how they define it, (2) its impact on their personal and professional lives, and (3) the strategies they use to cope with it.Participants and SettingData for this study were drawn from a larger investigation on workplace psychological health involving 310 CPWs in the Greater Montreal area. This analysis focuses on a subsample of 30 CPWs.MethodsThis exploratory qualitative study relies on a thematic analysis of anonymized transcripts of telephone interviews.ResultsParticipants defined accountability as a combination of professional, organizational, legal, and medical responsibilities inherent to CP work. Most reported negative effects, including stress, anxiety, reduced sense of competence, and work overload. Clinical support from colleagues and supervisors emerged as the most effective coping strategy.ConclusionsThis study reveals accountability as a complex, dynamic, and systemic experience for Quebec CPWs, significantly shaping their practice and well-being. Enhancing supervisory support and fostering peer collaboration could reduce stress and strengthen resilience, ultimately supporting better service outcomes and worker retention.

AI.tldr: 本研究探讨了加拿大魁北克儿童保护工作者（CPWs）对责任感的体验，包括其定义、对个人与职业生活的影响及应对策略。研究发现责任感是多维且动态的，对CPWs产生显著压力，而临床支持是最有效的应对方式。
AI.research_question: 魁北克儿童保护工作者如何定义责任感？责任感如何影响其个人与职业生活？他们如何应对这些影响？
AI.motivation: 责任感在儿童保护实践中至关重要，但科学文献对其定义及对工作者影响的研究不足。
AI.theoretical_framework: 本研究基于责任感的多维性理论，结合职业、组织、法律和医疗责任视角。
AI.method: 采用探索性定性研究设计，对30名CPWs的电话访谈记录进行主题分析。
AI.findings: 责任感被定义为多维责任，对CPWs产生负面心理影响，临床支持是最有效的应对策略。
AI.theory_contributions: 丰富了责任感在儿童保护领域的理论理解，强调其动态性和系统性。
AI.practical_contributions: 建议加强监督支持和同行协作，以减轻压力并提升工作者韧性，改善服务效果和人员保留。

title: Can Promoting E-Commerce Development Boost Consumption?
affiliations: Southwest Minzu University and China West Normal University

detail.title: Can Promoting E-Commerce Development Boost Consumption?
detail.abstract: Amid the rapid and sustained growth of the e-commerce economy and the active implementation of China's strategies to expand domestic demand, the influence of promoting e-commerce development on consumption has garnered widespread attention from various sectors. This study utilizes panel data from Chinese cities at the prefecture level and above from 2001 to 2019, treating the construction of national e-commerce demonstration cities as a quasi-natural experiment of China's local government efforts to promote e-commerce development. Using The propensity score matching difference-in-differences (PSM-DID) model, this research empirically examines the overall and dynamic effects of promoting e-commerce development on consumption, analyzes the heterogeneity and progressivity of these effects, and verifies the underlying mechanisms. The findings show that: Overall, promoting e-commerce development has a positive impact on consumption, and this positive impact continues to strengthen over time; the influence of promoting e-commerce development on consumption varies according to the foundational conditions of urban development and the consumption levels of individual cities; promoting e-commerce development can positively influence consumption through mechanisms such as enhancing technological innovation levels, increasing fixed asset investment, and raising urban residents' income, with greater impact on enterprise consumption expansion than on household consumption growth.

AI.tldr: 研究利用PSM-DID模型分析中国电子商务示范城市建设对消费的影响，发现其整体和动态效应显著，且通过技术创新、固定资产投资和居民收入提升等机制发挥作用。
AI.research_question: 电子商务发展对消费的整体和动态影响是什么？其异质性和机制如何？
AI.motivation: 电子商务经济快速增长，中国扩大内需战略背景下，探究电子商务发展对消费的影响具有重要意义。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于倾向得分匹配双重差分（PSM-DID）模型，分析电子商务示范城市建设对消费的影响。
AI.method: 利用2001-2019年中国地级及以上城市面板数据，采用PSM-DID模型进行实证分析。
AI.findings: 电子商务发展对消费有正向影响，且随时间增强；影响因城市基础条件和消费水平而异；通过技术创新、固定资产投资和居民收入提升等机制发挥作用。
AI.theory_contributions: 为电子商务与消费关系的理论提供了实证支持，揭示了动态效应和异质性。
AI.practical_contributions: 为地方政府制定电子商务政策提供依据，促进消费和内需增长。

title: Impetus of E-Customer Satisfaction and its Effects on E-Customer Loyalty- an Sem Approach on App-Based Instant Home Delivery Services
affiliations: Jashore University of Science and Technology, HSTU and BGMEA University of Fashion & Technology (BUFT)

detail.title: Impetus of E-Customer Satisfaction and its Effects on E-Customer Loyalty- an Sem Approach on App-Based Instant Home Delivery Services
detail.abstract: Despite extensive research on the application of the SERVQUAL model for measuring service quality, limited attention has been given to extending this model to the context of mobile app-based instant home delivery services. To address this issue, we intend to examine the effects of mobile app’s service quality dimension on e-customer satisfaction, subsequently on e-customer loyalty drawing upon both the SERVQUAL and Technology Acceptance Model (TAM) frameworks. To evaluate their effects, the responses (n=605) were collected from the mobile apps’ users for instant home delivery services using a questionnaire survey. The data were analyzed by the AMOS v-24 and PROCESS Macro v-4.20 software through the lens of Structural Equation Modeling (SEM). The results reveal that visual organization of the mobile apps, reliability, responsiveness, user-friendliness, and personal need fulfilment are the crucial predictors of e-customer satisfaction, which also can be turned into the e-customer loyalty. Furthermore, the study examines the mediating role of e-customer satisfaction in the proposed relationships. Our research contributes to the validation and extension of the SERVQUAL and TAM frameworks, offering practical implications for scholars and policymakers involved in managing mobile app-based instant home delivery services. The findings of this study have a significant impact on app developers and marketers in the instant home delivery sector. Identifying the primary quality aspects that influence customer satisfaction and loyalty in e-services provide valuable guidelines for enhancing app development. It is also significant for its focus on emerging markets, as it sheds light on how consumers behave in rapidly changing digital environments.

AI.tldr: 本研究扩展了SERVQUAL模型，结合TAM框架，探讨移动应用服务质量对电子客户满意度和忠诚度的影响，通过SEM分析揭示关键预测因素，并验证满意度在其中的中介作用。
AI.research_question: 移动应用的服务质量维度如何影响电子客户满意度和忠诚度？
AI.motivation: 现有研究对SERVQUAL模型在移动应用即时配送服务中的应用关注不足，本研究旨在填补这一空白。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于SERVQUAL模型和技术接受模型（TAM）。
AI.method: 通过问卷调查收集605名用户数据，使用AMOS和PROCESS Macro进行SEM分析。
AI.findings: 移动应用的视觉组织、可靠性、响应性、易用性和个性化需求满足是电子客户满意度和忠诚度的关键预测因素。
AI.theory_contributions: 验证并扩展了SERVQUAL和TAM框架，为新兴市场数字环境中的消费者行为研究提供理论支持。
AI.practical_contributions: 为移动应用开发者和营销人员提供优化服务质量、提升客户满意度和忠诚度的实践指导。

title: Community-Led Disaster Resilience: Strengthening Preparedness and Recovery in Regional Australia
affiliations: Coimbra University, Australian Red Cross and Independent Consultant

detail.title: Community-Led Disaster Resilience: Strengthening Preparedness and Recovery in Regional Australia
detail.abstract: Community-led disaster resilience is an emerging framework in disaster risk reduction that emphasises local leadership, grassroots coordination and adaptive strategies to enhance preparedness and recovery. It is based on community knowledge, lived experience of emergency events and readiness to contribute towards their own resilience with the help of external organisations. This paper explores community-led resilience models through the case study of the Australian Red Cross Community-Led Resilience Teams (CRT) program in regional New South Wales in Australia. Drawing on qualitative empirical data from the evaluation of the program in 2024, we analyse the strengths of community-led resilience efforts including their ability to enhance trust, social cohesion, and responsiveness to local needs. We also critically examine key challenges, such as sustaining long-term engagement, navigating resource limitations, and ensuring inclusivity, particularly in reaching marginalised groups. Our research shows that the success of community-led resilience is predicated on four essential factors: It requires for the community to be motivated to get involved; it is based on capacity and leadership within the community to manage emerging structures for resilience building; the timing for resilience-building needs to be right; and external services must be available to support the community in their efforts. This paper contributes to the broader conceptual understanding of how communities can be supported and empowered to drive their own resilience-building strategies. We offer insights for policymakers and practitioners on fostering sustainable, scalable, and inclusive community resilience, emphasising the role of community leadership in shaping disaster preparedness and response.

AI.tldr: 本文通过澳大利亚新南威尔士州红十字会社区主导韧性团队（CRT）项目的案例研究，探讨了社区主导的灾害韧性模型，分析了其优势与挑战，并提出了成功的四个关键因素。
AI.research_question: 社区主导的灾害韧性模型如何通过本地领导和适应性策略提升灾害准备和恢复能力？
AI.motivation: 灾害风险减少领域中，社区主导的韧性框架逐渐受到关注，但其具体实施和效果仍需深入研究。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于社区知识和生活经验的社区主导韧性理论，强调本地领导和外部支持的作用。
AI.method: 采用定性实证数据，分析2024年CRT项目的评估结果。
AI.findings: 社区主导韧性的成功依赖于四个因素：社区参与动机、本地领导能力、合适的时机以及外部支持。
AI.theory_contributions: 丰富了社区主导韧性的概念理解，强调了社区领导在灾害准备和响应中的核心作用。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者和实践者提供了促进可持续、可扩展和包容性社区韧性的建议。

title: Vibe Coding as a Reconfiguration of Intent Mediation in Software Development: Definition, Implications, and Research Agenda
affiliations: Ruhr University of Bochum, Ruhr University Bochum, Ruhr University Bochum, Ruhr University Bochum and Ruhr University Bochum

detail.title: Vibe Coding as a Reconfiguration of Intent Mediation in Software Development: Definition, Implications, and Research Agenda
detail.abstract: Software development is undergoing a fundamental transformation as vibe coding becomes widespread, with large portions of contemporary codebases now being AI-generated. The disconnect between rapid adoption and limited conceptual understanding highlights the need for an inquiry into this emerging paradigm. Drawing on an intent perspective and historical analysis, we define vibe coding as a software development paradigm where humans and generative AI engage in collaborative flow to co-create software artifacts through natural language dialogue, shifting the mediation of developer intent from deterministic instruction to probabilistic inference. By intent mediation, we refer to the fundamental process through which developers translate their conceptual goals into representations that computational systems can execute. Our results show that vibe coding reconfigures cognitive work by redistributing epistemic labor between humans and machines, shifting the expertise in the software development process away from traditional areas such as design or technical implementation toward collaborative orchestration. We identify key opportunities, including democratization, acceleration, and systemic leverage, alongside risks, such as black box codebases, responsibility gaps, and ecosystem bias. We conclude with a research agenda spanning human-, technology-, and organization-centered directions to guide future investigations of this paradigm.

AI.tldr: 本文探讨了AI生成的代码（vibe coding）对软件开发的影响，提出了一种新的协作范式，并分析了其机遇与风险。
AI.research_question: AI生成的代码（vibe coding）如何改变软件开发范式及其影响？
AI.motivation: 随着AI生成代码的普及，快速采用与有限概念理解之间的脱节需要深入研究。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于意图视角和历史分析，定义了vibe coding为一种人与生成式AI通过自然语言对话协作开发软件的范式。
AI.method: 通过意图中介理论，分析开发者如何将概念目标转化为可执行的代码表示。
AI.findings: vibe coding重新分配了认知劳动，将软件开发的专业知识从传统领域转向协作编排。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了vibe coding作为一种新范式的理论框架，并探讨了其对认知劳动的影响。
AI.practical_contributions: 识别了民主化、加速和系统性杠杆等机遇，以及黑盒代码、责任缺口和生态系统偏见等风险。

title: OntoMotoOS Collective Intelligence Protocol for Multi-AI Cooperative Governance (Part 3 of the OntoMotoOS Conceptual Framework Series)
affiliations: Independent Researcher, South Korea

detail.title: OntoMotoOS Collective Intelligence Protocol for Multi-AI Cooperative Governance (Part 3 of the OntoMotoOS Conceptual Framework Series)
detail.abstract:
This paper presents the Collective Intelligence Protocol (CIP), the third component of the OntoMotoOS conceptual framework, designed to enable cooperative governance among heterogeneous Artificial Intelligence (AI) systems.

While Part 1 outlined a holistic governance roadmap and Part 2 developed the Value-Based Logical Safety Filter for risk detection and mitigation, this work focuses on collaborative decision-making, distributed risk assessment, and consensus formation in multi-AI environments.

The CIP is conceptually designed to:

  • Facilitate decentralized yet ethically aligned governance processes.

  • Integrate dynamic trust scoring and reputation mechanisms across AI nodes.

  • Apply the Annex, Gate, and Phoenix meta-protocols for conflict resolution, emergency intervention, and system recovery.

  • Harmonize domain-specific vocabularies and ethical imperatives through ontological mapping to ensure interpretability and fairness.

The framework supports theoretical compatibility with blockchain-based governance logs, post-quantum encryption, and sector-specific coordination in domains such as autonomous medicine, finance, and critical infrastructure.

No physical or operational implementation has been performed at this stage; the design remains conceptual, supported by simulation-ready specifications, governance flow diagrams, and proposed pilot testing pathways.

AI.tldr: 本文介绍了《集体智能协议（CIP）》，作为OntoMotoOS概念框架的第三部分，旨在实现异构人工智能（AI）系统间的协作治理。
AI.research_question: 如何在多AI环境中实现协作决策、分布式风险评估和共识形成？
AI.motivation: 前两部分分别提出了整体治理路线图和基于价值的逻辑安全过滤器，本部分旨在填补协作治理的空白。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于OntoMotoOS框架，结合动态信任评分、声誉机制和元协议（Annex、Gate、Phoenix）。
AI.method: 概念设计，包括模拟就绪规范、治理流程图和试点测试路径。
AI.findings: CIP支持去中心化但伦理对齐的治理流程，并能与区块链治理日志、后量子加密等技术兼容。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了协作治理的理论框架，填补了多AI系统治理的空白。
AI.practical_contributions: 为自主医疗、金融和关键基础设施等领域提供了潜在的应用路径。

title: Digital Leadership Edge: Chairman Traits and Digital Transformation
affiliations: Cheung Kong Graduate School of Business, Stanford Digital Economy Lab and Cheung Kong Graduate School of Business

detail.title: Digital Leadership Edge: Chairman Traits and Digital Transformation
detail.abstract: Digital leadership, the ability to envision, strategize, and execute technology-driven organizational transformation, is increasingly vital for firm adaptation in the digital economy. This study explores the pivotal role of top leadership in driving digital transformation in emerging markets, a strategic frontier for digital and AI growth where top-down strategy prevails. Focusing on China, a key arena for digital advancement, we conceptualize digital leadership as a multi-dimensional, trait-based capability shaped by personal and professional attributes. Analyzing over 4,000 Chinese A-share listed firms (2016-2021), our mixed-method approach investigates not only whether chairmen lead digital transformation, but also what determines their capacity to do so. We identify key chairperson traits-technical background, R&D experience, and long-term orientation-as predictors of digital strategy emphasis and talent acquisition. Clustering reveals four leadership archetypes: technocrats, practitioners, agents, and grassroots leaders, with varying impacts on transformation outcomes. Technocrats and practitioners show better digital leadership, with technocrats excelling in private firms and mature governance systems, while agents play a larger role in SOEs under institutional constraints. To reinforce the link between chairman characteristics and digital transformation, we exploit staggered digital government reforms as a quasi-exogenous shock and identify a causal effect between the political embeddedness of chairmen and enhanced digital transformation. The study is among the first to study how digital leadership-shaped by individual traits and institutional alignment-addresses transformation challenges in emerging markets. Our findings highlight how leadership shapes organizational digital growth.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了新兴市场中高层领导在推动数字化转型中的关键作用，特别关注中国A股上市公司的董事长特质如何影响数字化转型。研究发现，技术背景、研发经验和长期导向是推动数字化转型的关键特质，并识别出四种领导原型。
AI.research_question: 高层领导的特质如何影响新兴市场中的数字化转型？
AI.motivation: 数字化转型在数字经济中日益重要，而新兴市场是数字和人工智能增长的前沿，需要自上而下的战略推动。
AI.theoretical_framework: 数字领导力被概念化为多维度的特质能力，受个人和专业属性影响。
AI.method: 混合方法研究，分析了2016-2021年间4000多家中国A股上市公司数据，并利用数字政府改革作为准外生冲击。
AI.findings: 董事长特质（技术背景、研发经验、长期导向）显著影响数字化转型；四种领导原型（技术专家、实践者、代理人和草根领导者）对转型结果有不同影响。
AI.theory_contributions: 首次研究数字领导力如何通过个人特质和制度匹配解决新兴市场的转型挑战。
AI.practical_contributions: 为企业选拔和培养数字领导者提供指导，并揭示制度环境对领导力效用的调节作用。

title: Security and Privacy Challenges in Cloud-Based Database Management: Strategies and Solutions
affiliations: affiliation not provided to SSRN, affiliation not provided to SSRN and affiliation not provided to SSRN

detail.title: Security and Privacy Challenges in Cloud-Based Database Management: Strategies and Solutions
detail.abstract: The many benefits of scalability, affordability, and accessibility are driving the growing popularity of database management systems hosted in the cloud. But new security and privacy concerns arise as a result of this change, and they must be carefully considered. This article explores the numerous privacy and security flaws, such as data breaches, illegal access, and compliance issues, that are inherent to databases hosted on the cloud. This article takes a look at the cloud from the user and provider points of view, and it discusses the main techniques and solutions that may be used to lessen the impact of these risks. The report argues for a multi-pronged strategy to protect sensitive data kept in the cloud, including strong encryption, access control methods, data governance frameworks, and user awareness training. In addition, the article delves into how regulations like GDPR and HIPAA affect database administration in the cloud. The document lists recommended practices for protecting personal information within the bounds of the law, drawing attention to the necessity of taking preventative actions to comply with these rules. This article seeks to offer useful insights to individuals and organisations who depend on cloud-based database management systems by critically analysing current difficulties and exploring appropriate solutions. The document enables stakeholders to harness the advantages of the cloud while protecting their precious data by stressing the significance of a thorough security and privacy plan.

AI.tldr: 本文探讨了云数据库管理系统的安全与隐私问题，提出了多管齐下的解决方案，包括加密、访问控制和合规性措施。
AI.research_question: 如何解决云数据库管理系统中的安全与隐私问题？
AI.motivation: 云数据库的普及带来了安全与隐私的新挑战，需要系统性的解决方案。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于数据安全、隐私保护和合规性理论。
AI.method: 从用户和提供商视角分析问题，并提出技术和管理解决方案。
AI.findings: 云数据库存在数据泄露、非法访问和合规性问题，需综合措施应对。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了云数据库安全与隐私保护的理论框架。
AI.practical_contributions: 提供了加密、访问控制和合规性实践指南，帮助用户和提供商保护数据。

title: World's First 5G-Based Intercontinental Remote Robotic Surgery: Framework Development for End-to-End Management Ensuring Medical Quality and Safety
affiliations: Fujian Medical University - Department of Endocrinology and Fujian Medical University - Fujian Provincial Hospital

detail.title: World's First 5G-Based Intercontinental Remote Robotic Surgery: Framework Development for End-to-End Management Ensuring Medical Quality and Safety
detail.abstract: With the advancement and development of technologies such as robot-assisted surgery, computer-assisted surgical systems, 5G network transmission, and artificial intelligence (AI), coupled with the growing demand from patients for high-quality medical services, telesurgery has transcended spatial limitations. It can swiftly deliver top-tier surgical expertise to any area within communication coverage, significantly enhancing the efficiency of medical services. In July 2025, the urology team at Fuzhou University Affiliated Provincial Hospital, a tertiary care institution, in collaboration with experts from Beijing and France, successfully performed the world's first remote robotic-assisted surgery over a network distance of 15,000 kilometers (9,400 kilometers in a straight line). Utilizing a 5G ultra-remote domestic surgical robot, they performed the resection and anastomosis of the upper segment of the left ureter. This groundbreaking procedure was live-streamed globally during the International Society of Robotic Surgery (SRS) Annual Meeting, marking it as the world's first cross-continental three-console robot-assisted 5G ultra-telesurgery. To establish a management system that aligns with the advancement of emerging medical technologies, this paper employs SWOT analysis to explore a comprehensive control model for telesurgery throughout all phases: before, during, and after the operation. The focus is on medical quality and safety while constructing a management framework centered on patient safety. This framework is supported by technological advancements and reinforced by systematic processes. Ultimately, this lays a solid foundation for the widespread application of telesurgery.

AI.tldr: 本文探讨了远程手术的管理体系，通过SWOT分析构建了一个以患者安全为中心、技术为支撑的全流程控制模型，为远程手术的广泛应用奠定基础。
AI.research_question: 如何构建一个与新兴医疗技术发展相适应的远程手术全流程管理体系？
AI.motivation: 随着机器人辅助手术、5G网络传输和人工智能等技术的发展，远程手术需求增长，亟需建立一套以医疗质量和安全为核心的管理体系。
AI.theoretical_framework: SWOT分析理论用于评估远程手术的优势、劣势、机会和威胁。
AI.method: 采用SWOT分析法，构建远程手术术前、术中和术后的全流程控制模型。
AI.findings: 成功构建了一个以患者安全为中心、技术为支撑的管理框架，为远程手术的广泛应用提供了理论基础。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了远程手术全流程管理的理论模型，填补了相关领域的研究空白。
AI.practical_contributions: 为医疗机构提供了可操作的远程手术管理框架，提升了医疗质量和安全性。

title: Exploring Data Analytics on Open-Source Software Repositories: A Review of Development Activities and Tools for Mining Logs
affiliations: University of Wollongong in Dubai

detail.title: Exploring Data Analytics on Open-Source Software Repositories: A Review of Development Activities and Tools for Mining Logs
detail.abstract: The rapid evolution of software development practices, coupled with the increasing prominence of open-source software (OSS) projects, has positioned versioning systems as invaluable repositories of information for analysis. This paper delves into the factors that shape software development activities by examining documented methodologies and tools used to mine and analyze OSS repositories. Through a detailed review of approaches addressing developer contributions, code modifications, and collaborative workflows, we identify key influences on productivity, code quality. Our exploration includes an analysis of analytics techniques and tools, such as CVSSearch and CVSAnalY, that facilitate a deeper understanding of developer behaviour and project evolution.

AI.tldr: 本文探讨了开源软件（OSS）项目中影响软件开发活动的因素，通过分析开发者贡献、代码修改和协作工作流，识别了生产力和代码质量的关键影响因素，并介绍了相关分析工具。
AI.research_question: 哪些因素影响了开源软件项目中的软件开发活动？
AI.motivation: 随着软件开发实践的快速演变和开源软件的日益普及，版本控制系统成为分析软件开发活动的重要信息来源。
AI.theoretical_framework: 开源软件开发、版本控制系统、开发者行为分析。
AI.method: 通过文献综述分析开源软件仓库中的开发者贡献、代码修改和协作工作流，并结合工具（如CVSSearch和CVSAnalY）进行数据分析。
AI.findings: 识别了影响生产力和代码质量的关键因素，并展示了相关分析工具的有效性。
AI.theory_contributions: 为开源软件开发活动的影响因素提供了理论框架和分析方法。
AI.practical_contributions: 为开发者和管理者提供了优化生产力和代码质量的工具和方法。

title: The Role of Social Media in Fostering Resilient Disaster Management
affiliations: affiliation not provided to SSRN and affiliation not provided to SSRN

detail.title: The Role of Social Media in Fostering Resilient Disaster Management
detail.abstract: Disasters are pivotal moments of societal instability, which, in addition to causing physical damage and threatening life, also disrupt information flow. Authorities implementing disaster management processes inevitably make decisions based on incomplete situational awareness. This study examines social media’s potential to enhance resilient disaster management by supporting knowledge formation and collective action. We adopt a mixed-methods approach with multiple data, consisting of documents, interviews and workshop material. Our findings indicate that social media enables means to support resilience strengthening mechanisms in disaster management in each temporal phase of disasters. Effective utilization of social media requires proactive strategic planning, stronger utilization of its potential for reciprocity, and recognizing it as a tool for learning and development. Social media can foster resilient disaster management by providing a platform for increasing awareness and motivation, facilitating proactive information gathering, supporting coordination and utilization of citizen knowledge, strengthening trust and the sense of security, and collecting feedback.

AI.tldr: 本研究探讨社交媒体如何通过支持知识形成和集体行动，增强灾害管理的韧性。采用混合方法分析多种数据，发现社交媒体在各灾害阶段均能支持韧性机制，但需战略规划、利用其互惠潜力并视其为学习工具。
AI.research_question: 社交媒体如何通过支持知识形成和集体行动，增强灾害管理的韧性？
AI.motivation: 灾害是导致社会不稳定的关键时刻，破坏信息流并影响决策。社交媒体可能通过增强信息流动和集体行动，提升灾害管理的韧性。
AI.theoretical_framework: 灾害管理韧性理论、社交媒体在灾害中的作用理论。
AI.method: 混合方法，包括文档分析、访谈和研讨会材料。
AI.findings: 社交媒体在各灾害阶段均能支持韧性机制，如提升意识、促进信息收集、协调公民知识、增强信任与安全感、收集反馈。
AI.theory_contributions: 扩展了社交媒体在灾害管理中的理论框架，强调其作为学习与互惠工具的作用。
AI.practical_contributions: 为灾害管理实践提供了社交媒体战略规划的建议，强调其潜力需通过主动利用和互惠机制实现。

title: Textual and AI-based Analysis of Climate Disclosures: Evidence from the European Energy Sector
affiliations: Excelia Business School

detail.title: Textual and AI-based Analysis of Climate Disclosures: Evidence from the European Energy Sector
detail.abstract: As European companies face increasing pressure to align with sustainability reporting frameworks, recent analyses of corporate disclosures reveal uneven quality, with gaps in clarity, structure, and thematic integration. This paper examines the textual structure of climaterelated financial disclosures in the European energy sector, focusing on their alignment with the Task Force on Climate-Related Financial Disclosures (TCFD) recommendations on governance, strategy, risk management, and metrics and targets. The analysis combines four layers: lexicometric diagnostics to assess readability and structure; AI-based BERT models to evaluate alignment; topic modeling to explore thematic organisation; and panel regressions to identify structural, financial, and cultural drivers. Results show that firms prioritize metrics and strategy over governance and risk management. Shorter, focused language improves alignment with risk disclosures, while lexical variety supports governance and strategy. Thematic analysis reveals fragmented climate narratives, suggesting limited maturity in integration. Regression results highlight that board gender diversity, ownership structure, ESG scores, EU taxonomy-aligned revenues, and cultural orientation are key drivers of TCFD alignment. These alignments are material, as each is significantly linked to firm valuation, indicating investors respond to depth and specificity of disclosures. Findings advance understanding of narrative climate disclosures and offer practical insights for assurance, benchmarking, and sustainability analysis.

AI.tldr: 本文分析了欧洲能源行业气候相关财务披露的文本结构，评估其与TCFD建议的对齐情况，发现企业在治理和风险管理方面表现不足，并揭示了影响对齐的关键驱动因素及其对企业估值的影响。
AI.research_question: 欧洲能源行业的气候相关财务披露如何与TCFD建议对齐？
AI.motivation: 欧洲企业在可持续发展报告框架下的披露质量参差不齐，缺乏清晰性和主题整合，因此需要研究其对齐情况及其驱动因素。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于TCFD框架（治理、战略、风险管理和指标与目标）和文本分析方法（如BERT模型、主题建模和面板回归）。
AI.method: 结合了词汇计量诊断、基于BERT的AI模型、主题建模和面板回归分析。
AI.findings: 企业更注重指标和战略而非治理和风险管理；语言简洁和词汇多样性分别影响风险披露和治理战略的对齐；主题分析显示气候叙述碎片化；董事会性别多样性、所有权结构、ESG评分等是TCFD对齐的关键驱动因素。
AI.theory_contributions: 深化了对叙事性气候披露的理解，揭示了文本结构与披露质量的关系。
AI.practical_contributions: 为审计、基准测试和可持续发展分析提供了实用见解，帮助企业改进披露质量。

title: Experimental Evidence on Systematic Misperceptions About Non-Selfish Behaviors
affiliations: Monash University, affiliation not provided to SSRN, Universidad Autonoma de Madrid, Universidad Autonoma de Madrid and Spanish Council for Scientific Research (CSIC)

detail.title: Experimental Evidence on Systematic Misperceptions About Non-Selfish Behaviors
detail.abstract: We investigate misperceptions regarding non-selfish behavior focusing on the extent to which second-party punishment and reward are either underestimated or overestimated. Our study encompasses various games and treatments that span a wide array of decision environments, including different (i) trade-offs (e.g., Pareto vs. non-Pareto dominated, socially efficient vs. inefficient), (ii) motives for non-selfish behavior (e.g., inequity aversion, reciprocity), (iii) costs associated with punishing and rewarding, (iv) incentives for belief accuracy, and (v) the number of allocations in a given game. Our findings reveal a consistent underestimation of rewards at both the aggregate and individual levels. This suggests that individuals harbor pessimistic perceptions or "mental models" regarding human rewarding behavior, regardless of the decision environment and incentives at play. In contrast, beliefs concerning punishment tend to be more accurate, indicating that participants anticipate altruistic punishment within our experimental setup. Additionally, we observe that women, economists, and individuals with stronger religious affiliations tend to underestimate rewards.

AI.tldr: 研究探讨了对非自私行为的误解，重点关注第二方惩罚和奖励被低估或高估的程度。研究发现奖励在整体和个体层面均被低估，而惩罚信念更准确。女性、经济学家和宗教倾向较强的人更易低估奖励。
AI.research_question: 第二方惩罚和奖励行为在多大程度上被低估或高估？
AI.motivation: 探讨人们对非自私行为的误解，尤其是惩罚和奖励的预期偏差。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于非自私行为的理论（如不平等厌恶、互惠）和决策环境（如帕累托效率、社会效率）。
AI.method: 通过多种游戏和实验设计，涵盖不同的决策环境、动机、成本和激励。
AI.findings: 奖励行为被普遍低估，惩罚信念更准确；女性、经济学家和宗教倾向强的人更易低估奖励。
AI.theory_contributions: 揭示了人们对奖励行为的悲观预期，丰富了非自私行为的研究。
AI.practical_contributions: 为行为经济学和政策设计提供了关于惩罚和奖励预期的实证依据。

title: Political Connections and Access to Finance for SMEs: The Role of Discouraged Borrowers
affiliations: Xiamen University - School of Management and Durham University

detail.title: Political Connections and Access to Finance for SMEs: The Role of Discouraged Borrowers

keywords.keywords: Political connections; Bank lending; Credit access; Discouraged Borrowers; SMEs

detail.abstract: Using a sample of 6,399 SMEs across 22 transition countries, we show that firms with political connections are 6% less likely to be credit constrained compared to firms without political connections. This improved access to credit is mainly driven by the fact that politically connected SMEs are less likely to be discouraged from seeking external debt financing, rather than because of the preferential lending they receive from banks. This credit encouragement effect is stronger in countries with weaker formal institutions, among firms facing lower agency costs, and is linked to higher firm productivity. Our findings have important implications for policies targeting to improve credit access for SMEs.

AI.tldr: 研究表明，政治关联使中小企业在转型国家中信贷约束概率降低6%，主要原因是政治关联减少了企业对债务融资的畏惧，而非银行优惠贷款。
AI.research_question: 政治关联如何影响中小企业的信贷约束？
AI.motivation: 探讨政治关联对中小企业信贷获取的影响，特别是在转型国家中。
AI.theoretical_framework: 政治关联理论、信贷约束理论、制度理论。
AI.method: 基于22个转型国家的6,399家中小企业样本进行实证分析。
AI.findings: 政治关联企业信贷约束概率低6%，主要源于信贷鼓励效应，而非银行优惠。效应在制度较弱国家、代理成本较低企业中更强，且与企业生产力正相关。
AI.theory_contributions: 揭示了政治关联通过信贷鼓励效应影响信贷约束的机制，补充了制度理论。
AI.practical_contributions: 为改善中小企业信贷获取政策提供了依据，强调制度环境的重要性。

title: Knowledgeable Partisans and Inflation Expectations
affiliations: Carleton College and Carleton College - Department of Economics

detail.title: Knowledgeable Partisans and Inflation Expectations

declarations.declarationOfInterest: Both authors declare they have no relevant personal or financial interests that affected this study.
declarations.funderStatement: The data in this survey is from a module of the 2024 Cooperative Election Study, which received support from the National Science Foundation (award number \# 2342506).

detail.abstract: Using a nationally representative survey from the 2024 United States presidential election, we investigate the role knowledge plays in the difference between inflation expectations of Republicans and Democrats. Unconditionally, Republicans' average inflation forecast was nearly 3% higher than Democrats; they also reported higher inflation in the past year (3.5%) and higher expectations in the long run (2.0%). Conditioning on their beliefs about the future and their long-run forecasts reduces the pure partisan gap in inflation forecasts by two thirds. The gap between Democrats and Republicans is largest for partisans who are the most knowledgeable about politics. Greater numeracy appears to exacerbate the partisan gap, while greater economic knowledge mitigates it. The differential role of partisan and economic knowledge are consistent with a model where respondents' survey responses balance objective forecasts with affective motives.

AI.tldr: 本文通过2024年美国总统选举的全国代表性调查，研究了知识在共和党和民主党通胀预期差异中的作用。研究发现，共和党的平均通胀预期比民主党高出近3%，且对过去一年和长期通胀的预期也更高。通过控制对未来和长期通胀的信念，党派差异减少了三分之二。政治知识水平较高的党派间差异最大，而经济知识则能缓解这种差异。
AI.research_question: 知识在共和党和民主党通胀预期差异中扮演什么角色？
AI.motivation: 探讨党派间通胀预期差异的根源，尤其是知识对其的影响。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于党派偏见和知识对经济预期的影响理论。
AI.method: 使用2024年美国总统选举的全国代表性调查数据进行分析。
AI.findings: 共和党的通胀预期显著高于民主党，政治知识水平高的党派间差异最大，经济知识能缓解差异。
AI.theory_contributions: 揭示了知识类型（政治与经济）对党派通胀预期差异的不同影响。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者提供了理解党派间经济预期差异的视角。

title: Climate Change Risk and the Cost of Mortgage Credit
affiliations: Durham University, University of Zurich - Department Finance, Xiamen University - School of Management and University of Edinburgh - Business School

detail.title: Climate Change Risk and the Cost of Mortgage Credit

publicationDetails.detailsText: Swiss Finance Institute Research Paper No. 20-97
publicationDetails.journalName: Swiss Finance Institute Research Paper Series

detail.abstract: We show that lenders charge higher interest rates for mortgages on properties exposed to a greater risk of sea level rise (SLR). This SLR premium is not evident in short-term loans and is not related to borrowers’ short-term realized default or creditworthiness. Further, the SLR premium is smaller when the consequences of climate change are less salient and in areas with more climate change deniers. Overall, our results suggest that mortgage lenders view the risk of SLR as a long term risk, and that attention and beliefs are potential barriers through which SLR risk is priced in residential mortgage markets.

AI.tldr: 研究表明，贷款机构对面临更高海平面上升风险的房产收取更高的抵押贷款利率。这种溢价在短期贷款中不明显，且与借款人的短期违约或信用无关。此外，当气候变化后果不明显或气候否认者较多时，溢价较低。
AI.research_question: 抵押贷款机构如何将海平面上升风险定价到住宅抵押贷款市场中？
AI.motivation: 探讨气候变化对金融市场的长期影响，尤其是抵押贷款市场的风险定价机制。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于风险定价理论和行为经济学，关注长期风险与市场参与者信念的影响。
AI.method: 通过分析抵押贷款利率数据，结合海平面上升风险指标和地区特征，进行实证研究。
AI.findings: 贷款机构对高海平面上升风险的房产收取更高利率，溢价与长期风险相关，且受市场关注和信念影响。
AI.theory_contributions: 揭示了长期气候风险在金融市场中的定价机制，强调了注意力和信念的作用。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者和金融机构提供了应对气候风险的定价策略参考。

title: Measuring Employers’ Demand for Personality Traits in Job Ads
affiliations: University of Alberta and University of Alberta - Department of Economics

detail.title: Measuring Employers’ Demand for Personality Traits in Job Ads
detail.abstract: We propose measures of employers’ demands for personality traits from job ads based on employers' use of trait-descriptive terms from the psychology literature on personality. Identifying personality demands in job ads requires addressing challenges such as the prevalence of false positives. We demonstrate that as many as half of all instances of trait descriptive terms in job ads are false positives in the sense that they do not refer to workers' personalities. The presence of false negatives is less problematic. After eliminating false positives, we validate that our measures capture employers' demand for personality traits by showing that, at the occupation level, our measures are correlated with the traits of individuals in those occupations for all traits except emotional stability. In our sample of job ads, personality trait demands are as prevalent in ads as requirements for human capital such as education and work experience. Consistent with evidence on the importance of social skills in the labor market, extroversion is the trait most commonly sought by employers, but a substantial fraction of ads also indicate demand for conscientiousness, openness, and agreeableness.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种基于心理学文献中人格特质描述词的雇主需求测量方法，解决了招聘广告中人格特质需求识别中的假阳性问题，并验证了测量结果的有效性。研究发现，外向性是雇主最常需求的性格特质，但其他特质如尽责性、开放性和宜人性也有显著需求。
AI.research_question: 如何准确测量招聘广告中雇主对人格特质的需求？
AI.motivation: 招聘广告中的人格特质需求识别存在假阳性和假阴性问题，需要一种有效的方法来解决这些问题并验证测量结果的准确性。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于心理学文献中的人格特质理论，特别是五大人格特质模型（外向性、尽责性、开放性、宜人性和情绪稳定性）。
AI.method: 通过分析招聘广告中的人格特质描述词，排除假阳性实例，并验证测量结果与职业中个体特质的相关性。
AI.findings: 研究发现，外向性是雇主最常需求的性格特质，但尽责性、开放性和宜人性也有显著需求。人格特质需求在招聘广告中与教育和工作经验需求同样普遍。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了一种解决招聘广告中人格特质需求识别问题的方法，并验证了其有效性。
AI.practical_contributions: 为雇主和招聘人员提供了更准确的工具来识别和表达对人格特质的需求，有助于优化招聘流程。

title: Extreme Weather and Indigenous Peoples: Impacts on Business Activity
affiliations: University of California, Davis - Graduate School of Management, Victoria University of Wellington - Te Herenga Waka - School of Accounting and Commercial Law and University of Otago

detail.title: Extreme Weather and Indigenous Peoples: Impacts on Business Activity
detail.abstract: Whereas numerous studies document the impacts of climate change on business activity, evidence on how it aOects the people running those businesses-who may come from diverse socioeconomic backgrounds-remains mixed and not well understood. This study investigates the economic impact of extreme weather events (EWEs) on business activity in New Zealand, with a focus on businesses in Māori and non-Māori communities. Using a novel combination of datasets, including up to 15 years of monthly business sales, meteorological data, demographic statistics, and ancestral geographic markers, we examine how extreme hot and cold temperature, rainfall, and wind events influence sales at the micro level, across over 2,000 statistical area units (SA2s). Extreme heat EWEs significantly reduce business sales, with an average monthly decline of 1.77% and an average annual loss per business unit of $US 23,390 (standard deviation $US 19,189). This eOect follows a non-linear, hump-shaped pattern, intensifying above 23°C. However, despite well documented socioeconomic disparities, Māori and non-Māori populations exhibit virtually identical business responses to EWEs after controlling for location and socioeconomic disparities. This reveals that Indigenous identification alone does not shape business vulnerability to climate-related disruptions. Our findings provide new insights into climate adaptation, Indigenous economic resilience, and sustainable development. They underscore the need for targeted climate policies that address broad business vulnerabilities, rather than directing resources solely based on ethnic or cultural characteristics.*

AI.tldr: 本文研究了极端天气事件（EWEs）对新西兰商业活动的影响，特别关注毛利和非毛利社区的企业。研究发现极端高温显著降低企业销售额，但毛利和非毛利企业在控制其他因素后反应几乎相同。
AI.research_question: 极端天气事件如何影响新西兰毛利和非毛利社区的企业经济活动？
AI.motivation: 尽管气候变化对商业活动的影响已有大量研究，但对不同社会经济背景的企业主的影响仍不明确。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于气候经济学和商业脆弱性理论。
AI.method: 结合15年的月度销售数据、气象数据、人口统计和地理标记，分析2000多个统计区域单位（SA2s）的数据。
AI.findings: 极端高温导致企业月销售额平均下降1.77%，年均损失23,390美元；毛利和非毛利企业在控制其他因素后反应无显著差异。
AI.theory_contributions: 揭示了种族身份并非商业对气候脆弱性的决定因素。
AI.practical_contributions: 建议制定针对广泛商业脆弱性的气候政策，而非仅基于种族或文化特征。

title: An Empirical Study of Bid Protests by Disappointed Tenderers in U.S. States
affiliations: Independent

detail.title: An Empirical Study of Bid Protests by Disappointed Tenderers in U.S. States

keywords: World Trade Organization Government Procurement Agreement

detail.abstract: Trade negotiators have long sought increased access to US subcentral procurement. Coverage of trade agreements is a quantitative component of that effort; there is also a qualitative component. If market access is to be of any value, it must be meaningful. And meaningful access must entail the availability of remedies for disappointed suppliers such as those mandated by the Agreement on Government Procurement. Until now little effort has been made to assess the utilization of such procedures at the subcentral level. This article fills that gap. It assembles data on bid protest rates for 2 7 of the 3 7 signatory states as well as 9 of the 13 non-signatory states. Litigation in both groups is robust. On average, protests in the United States are at least as common at the state level as at the federal level. Apart from the inherent value of such data, one would hope that awareness that protests are common at the state level would foster confidence among foreign suppliers and thus encourage greater participation from abroad.

AI.tldr: 本文填补了关于美国次中央政府采购中投标抗议程序使用情况的空白，通过分析27个签署州和9个非签署州的数据，发现抗议行为在州一级与联邦一级同样普遍。
AI.research_question: 美国次中央政府采购中的投标抗议程序使用情况如何？
AI.motivation: 评估抗议程序的使用情况有助于提升外国供应商的信心，促进国际贸易。
AI.theoretical_framework: 政府采购协议（Agreement on Government Procurement）中关于供应商救济的理论。
AI.method: 收集并分析27个签署州和9个非签署州的投标抗议率数据。
AI.findings: 抗议行为在州一级与联邦一级同样普遍。
AI.theory_contributions: 填补了关于次中央政府采购抗议程序使用情况的研究空白。
AI.practical_contributions: 增强外国供应商对美国次中央政府采购市场的信心，促进国际贸易参与。

title: Untwisting the Security of Undersea Internet Cables
affiliations: Seton Hall Law School

detail.title: Untwisting the Security of Undersea Internet Cables
detail.abstract: Nearly all the intercontinental Internet traffic around the world depends on a relative handful of undersea cables. Without them, the Internet as we know it would not exist.  These undersea cables are under attack. These attacks raise challenging issues relating to the international law of the sea and the laws of armed conflict.  This article presents the most comprehensive analysis of these issues in the literature. It is also the only article to conceive of the problem not only as one of international law but also as one of internet governance. The Internet’s physical core entwines the globe and complicates Westphalian international law paradigms. The influence of a small number of large multinational companies over the physical core makes the problem even more confounding. It will take multiple, subtly calibrated policy interventions to make some progress on this knotty problem consistent with sound principles of Internet governance.

AI.tldr: 本文全面分析了海底电缆面临的攻击问题及其对国际海洋法和武装冲突法的挑战，同时将其视为互联网治理问题。
AI.research_question: 海底电缆攻击如何挑战国际海洋法、武装冲突法及互联网治理？
AI.motivation: 海底电缆是全球互联网流量的核心，其安全问题对国际法和互联网治理提出了复杂挑战。
AI.theoretical_framework: 国际海洋法、武装冲突法、互联网治理理论。
AI.method: 文献综述与法律分析。
AI.findings: 海底电缆攻击问题需结合国际法和互联网治理理论，通过多维度政策干预解决。
AI.theory_contributions: 扩展了国际法与互联网治理的交叉研究。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者提供了解决海底电缆安全问题的框架。

title: Governance: Productivity and Friction
affiliations: James Cook University - College of Business, Law and Governance,

detail.title: Governance: Productivity and Friction

keywords: Governance frictionPolycentric governance Mission-oriented investment Public sector capability Institutional design Reflexive governance Legitimacy metrics Co-governance Adaptive governance Distributed decision-making

detail.abstract: Australia's labour productivity growth has stalled, with output per hour worked falling 3.5 per cent in 2022-23, the sharpest decline in six decades. In response, the Future Made in Australia Act 2024 (FMIA) commits $22.7 billion to mission-driven investment in critical minerals, clean energy, sovereign manufacturing, and emerging technologies. The policy vision is strategically sound, but history shows that investment alone does not guarantee capability gains. Past initiatives have been slowed, diluted, or derailed by governance friction, structural, procedural, relational, and adaptive weaknesses that erode legitimacy, stall delivery, and limit long-term impact. Without reform, FMIA risks repeating the experience of underperforming programs such as the Northern Australia Infrastructure Facility, rather than replicating agile, trusted models like the Clean Energy Finance Corporation. Four governance frictions are most likely to undermine FMIA's ambitions: 1. Structural-Centralised decision-making that sidelines regional and sector-specific priorities. 2. Procedural-Output-driven, contractual funding models that discourage long-term capability-building. 3. Relational-Weak stakeholder trust due to opaque governance processes. 4. Adaptive-Limited mechanisms for regular review and course correction.

AI.tldr: 澳大利亚劳动生产率增长停滞，2022-23年每小时产出下降3.5%，为60年来最大降幅。《2024年澳大利亚制造未来法案》（FMIA）承诺投入227亿美元用于关键矿产、清洁能源、主权制造和新兴技术的使命驱动投资。政策愿景战略上合理，但历史表明仅靠投资无法保证能力提升。过去的计划因治理摩擦、结构、程序、关系和适应性弱点而受阻，削弱了合法性、延缓了交付并限制了长期影响。若不改革，FMIA可能重蹈表现不佳计划的覆辙。
AI.research_question: 如何通过治理改革确保《2024年澳大利亚制造未来法案》（FMIA）实现其使命驱动的投资目标？
AI.motivation: 澳大利亚劳动生产率下降，需要政策干预以提升能力。FMIA作为新政策，需避免历史计划中的治理问题。
AI.theoretical_framework: 治理摩擦理论（结构性、程序性、关系性、适应性）
AI.method: 基于历史案例和政策分析，识别FMIA可能面临的治理摩擦。
AI.findings: FMIA可能面临四类治理摩擦：1. 结构性-集中决策忽视区域和行业需求；2. 程序性-合同化资金模型阻碍长期能力建设；3. 关系性-不透明的治理流程削弱利益相关者信任；4. 适应性-缺乏定期审查和调整机制。
AI.theory_contributions: 扩展治理摩擦理论在政策实施中的应用，强调适应性机制的重要性。
AI.practical_contributions: 为FMIA提供治理改革建议，避免历史计划的失败，提升政策有效性。

title: Agency Cost and Debt Financing: Evidence from Developing Countries
affiliations: University of Texas Rio Grande Valley (UTRGV) (Formerly University of Texas-Pan American) - College of Business and Entrepreneurship, University of Texas Rio Grande Valley and Southern Utah University

detail.title: Agency Cost and Debt Financing: Evidence from Developing Countries
detail.abstract: In this paper, we investigate the valuation effect of debt financing in the context of corporate agency problems. Utilizing debt financing announcements obtained from the news search in 19 emerging markets, we find that the announcement returns on new debts are positively associated with corporate agency costs measured by the ownership held by controlling shareholders who are affiliated with management and family members. These results are particularly strong in companies lacking other corporate governance mechanisms. We also identify that creditors' monitoring serves as a channel for value creation by efficient investments in M&As. Overall, our results shed light on the disciplinary role of creditors in the emerging markets, where extreme agency problems between controlling and non-controlling shareholders are prevalent.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了债务融资在公司代理问题背景下的估值效应，发现新债务公告回报与控股股东（与管理层及家族成员有关联）的持股比例呈正相关，尤其是在缺乏其他公司治理机制的公司中。此外，债权人监督通过高效并购投资创造了价值。
AI.research_question: 债务融资在公司代理问题背景下的估值效应如何？
AI.motivation: 探讨新兴市场中债务融资对解决控股股东与非控股股东之间极端代理问题的潜在作用。
AI.theoretical_framework: 代理理论、债务融资与公司治理的关系。
AI.method: 利用19个新兴市场的债务融资公告数据，分析公告回报与代理成本的关系。
AI.findings: 新债务公告回报与控股股东持股比例正相关，债权人监督通过并购投资创造价值。
AI.theory_contributions: 揭示了债权人在新兴市场中的监督作用，补充了代理理论。
AI.practical_contributions: 为新兴市场公司治理提供了债务融资作为解决代理问题的工具。

title: International Credit Cycles
affiliations: Tsinghua University - Tsinghua University School of Economics and Management, Fudan University - School of Economics and Shanghai University of Finance and Economics - School of Economics

detail.title: International Credit Cycles
detail.abstract: We develop a two-country model to study a novel transmission mechanism for financial crises through cross-border capital flows. In our model, an excessive credit expansion in one country exacerbates the moral hazard problem in its interbank market, leading to a market collapse and subsequent capital flight. Such inflows into the second country have nonmonotonic effects on its economy. While raising total credit for production, capital inflows exacerbate credit misallocation by tightening endogenous borrowing constraints for high-productivity agents. Sufficiently large inflows may trigger a collapse in the recipient country's interbank market, leading to a discontinuous welfare loss. We show that optimal policy responses depend on the magnitude and composition (debt versus FDI) of capital inflows.  In the dynamic model, we characterize various patterns of international financial risk contagion and endogenous boom-bust credit cycles in the global economy. The model provides a theoretical foundation for the empirical finding that surges in capital inflows, not just sudden stops, are potent predictors of banking crises.

AI.tldr: 本文通过两国模型研究了金融危机通过跨境资本流动的新传播机制，发现资本流入对接收国经济有非线性影响，可能导致信贷错配和市场崩溃。最优政策取决于资本流入的规模和类型。
AI.research_question: 跨境资本流动如何通过道德风险问题传播金融危机？
AI.motivation: 研究资本流入对接收国经济的非线性影响及其潜在危机传播机制。
AI.theoretical_framework: 两国模型、道德风险理论、信贷错配理论。
AI.method: 理论建模，分析资本流入对信贷市场和福利的影响。
AI.findings: 资本流入可能导致信贷错配和市场崩溃，最优政策需根据流入规模和类型调整。
AI.theory_contributions: 为资本流入与银行危机的关联提供了理论支持。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者提供了应对资本流入风险的框架。

title: Estimating the Information Component in Switching Costs: A Structural Approach
affiliations: University of Virginia, ESE Business School and Universidad Adolfo Ibáñez

detail.title: Estimating the Information Component in Switching Costs: A Structural Approach
detail.abstract: We exploit a regulatory reform in Chile to quantify the role of information frictions in consumer credit markets. The reform mandated a standardized, simple disclosure sheet for loan contract terms, facilitating comparison across lenders. Using administrative, loan-level data covering the universe of bank-originated credit, we document a 10% increase in price sensitivity from borrower switching behavior following the reform. Embedding this estimate into a dynamic structural model incorporating borrower search and bank pricing responses, we simulate long-run market equilibrium effects. We find that improved consumer search efficiency lowers average interest rates by 180 basis points increases borrower welfare by 15%.

AI.tldr: 智利的一项监管改革通过标准化贷款合同信息披露，减少了消费者信贷市场的信息摩擦，研究发现借款人价格敏感性提高10%，长期均衡下平均利率降低180个基点，借款人福利增加15%。
AI.research_question: 信息摩擦在消费者信贷市场中的作用是什么？
AI.motivation: 量化信息摩擦对消费者信贷市场的影响，并评估标准化信息披露的潜在效益。
AI.theoretical_framework: 信息不对称理论、消费者搜索行为理论。
AI.method: 利用智利监管改革的自然实验，结合行政贷款数据，构建动态结构模型分析借款人搜索和银行定价行为。
AI.findings: 标准化信息披露使借款人价格敏感性提高10%，长期均衡下平均利率降低180个基点，福利增加15%。
AI.theory_contributions: 验证了信息摩擦对信贷市场效率的影响，丰富了信息不对称理论的应用。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者提供了标准化信息披露的实际效果证据，支持类似监管改革的推广。

title: The Intergenerational Persistence of Intimate Partner Violence
affiliations: University of Galway

detail.title: The Intergenerational Persistence of Intimate Partner Violence
detail.abstract: This study quantifies the intergenerational persistence of intimate partner violence (IPV) in 55 low- and middle-income countries. Daughters of victims are 59-88% more likely to experience emotional, physical or sexual IPV. Persistence is partly explained by the intergenerational transmission of attitudes: Daughters of victims have more accepting attitudes toward IPV and marry men who are also more accepting, both of which predict the incidence of IPV. This greater acceptance among daughters of victims reflects the mother-to-daughter transmission of attitudes to IPV. Exploiting within-country, over-time variation, I show that improvements in gender equality and reductions in the societal acceptance of IPV are associated with reductions in both the incidence and persistence of IPV.

AI.tldr: 本研究量化了55个中低收入国家中亲密伴侣暴力（IPV）的代际持续性。受害者的女儿经历情感、身体或性IPV的可能性高出59-88%。这种持续性部分由态度代际传递解释：受害者的女儿对IPV更容忍，且嫁给同样更容忍的男性，两者均预测IPV发生率。受害者女儿对IPV的更高容忍反映了母亲对女儿的态度传递。利用国家内的时间变化，研究表明性别平等提升和社会对IPV容忍度降低与IPV发生率及持续性减少相关。
AI.research_question: 中低收入国家中亲密伴侣暴力（IPV）的代际持续性如何量化？其背后的机制是什么？
AI.motivation: 探讨IPV的代际传递现象及其影响因素，为政策制定提供依据。
AI.theoretical_framework: 态度代际传递理论、性别平等理论。
AI.method: 利用55个中低收入国家的数据，分析IPV代际持续性及其与态度传递的关系。
AI.findings: 受害者的女儿经历IPV的可能性高出59-88%，部分由态度代际传递解释。性别平等提升和社会对IPV容忍度降低与IPV减少相关。
AI.theory_contributions: 验证了态度代际传递在IPV持续性中的作用，扩展了性别平等理论的应用。
AI.practical_contributions: 为减少IPV的政策制定提供了实证支持，强调性别平等和态度转变的重要性。

title: Judicial Fairness Perception and Corporate Innovation: Evidence from Entrepreneur Survey in China
affiliations: Central University of Finance and Economics (CUFE) - School of Finance, Central University of Finance and Economics (CUFE) - School of Finance and Shenzhen University

detail.title: Judicial Fairness Perception and Corporate Innovation: Evidence from Entrepreneur Survey in China
detail.abstract: This study examines the impact of judicial fairness perception on corporate innovation among small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs) in China, utilizing data from the 2018 Enterprise Survey for Innovation and Entrepreneurship (ESIEC). Our findings reveal a robust positive relationship between higher levels of judicial fairness perception and increased innovation activities within SMEs. Notably, this effect is more pronounced in enterprises led by less-educated entrepreneurs, located in regions with weaker intellectual property protection, or with lower reliance on government support. We identify improved contract enforcement, enhanced policy effectiveness, and increased innovation investment as key mechanisms driving this relationship. These results suggest that judicial reforms to increase fairness can significantly foster innovation, particularly in resource-constrained SMEs in emerging economies.

AI.tldr: 研究表明，司法公平感知对中国中小企业的创新活动有显著正向影响，尤其在资源受限的企业中效果更明显。
AI.research_question: 司法公平感知如何影响中国中小企业的创新活动？
AI.motivation: 探讨司法公平对中小企业创新的作用，特别是在资源受限的环境中。
AI.theoretical_framework: 司法公平感知、企业创新、资源约束理论。
AI.method: 基于2018年中国企业创新创业调查（ESIEC）数据进行分析。
AI.findings: 司法公平感知与中小企业创新活动呈显著正相关，尤其在企业家教育水平较低、知识产权保护较弱或政府支持较少的企业中效果更显著。
AI.theory_contributions: 丰富了司法公平与企业创新关系的理论，强调了资源约束情境下的作用机制。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者提供司法改革促进创新的依据，尤其关注资源受限的中小企业。

title: ORTA ASYA TÜRK DEVLETLERİNİN ELEKTRİK İHRACATININ KARŞILAŞTIRMALI ÜSTÜNLÜĞÜ VE REKABET GÜCÜ ANALİZİ (COMPARATIVE ADVANTAGE AND COMPETITIVENESS ANALYSIS OF ELECTRICITY EXPORTS OF CENTRAL ASIAN TURKIC STATES)
affiliations: Bağımsız Araştırmacı and Sumgait State University

detail.title: ORTA ASYA TÜRK DEVLETLERİNİN ELEKTRİK İHRACATININ KARŞILAŞTIRMALI ÜSTÜNLÜĞÜ VE REKABET GÜCÜ ANALİZİ (COMPARATIVE ADVANTAGE AND COMPETITIVENESS ANALYSIS OF ELECTRICITY EXPORTS OF CENTRAL ASIAN TURKIC STATES)
detail.abstract:
Turkish abstract: Yeşil enerji üretiminin artırılması karbon emisyonlarının azaltılmasını sağlayarak sadece çevresel değil, aynı zamanda ekonomik ve stratejik bir avantaja dönüşmektedir. Bu konularda mevcut çalışmalar da yapılmıştır. Bu makalede, söz konusu ülkelerin 2017-2023 yılları arasındaki elektrik ihracatı incelenmekte ve ticaret dengesi, açıklanmış karşılaştırmalı üstünlük, göreli ticaret avantajı, göreli ihracat avantajı ve göreli ithalat avantajı endeksleri kullanılarak ampirik analizler yapılmaktadır. Kullanılan veri kaynağı Uluslararası Ticaret Merkezi’dir. Yapılan araştırma sonuçları, enerji sektöründe çeşitlendirmenin ve yenilenebilir enerji kaynaklarının geliştirilmesinin belirtilen ülkeler açısından stratejik öneme sahip olduğunu göstermektedir. Kazakistan, Türkmenistan ve Özbekistan'da yeşil kaynaklardan elektrik üretiminin artırılması, mevcut pazarlardan daha geniş pazarlara erişim imkânı yaratıyor. Yapılan analiz sonucunda Özbekistan ve Türkmenistan’ın rekabet avantajına sahip olduğu ortaya çıktı. Sonuçlar, yeşil enerji üretiminin artırılmasının söz konusu ülkelerin bölgesel ve küresel pazarlardaki konumlarını güçlendirebileceğini ve elektrik ihracatında sürdürülebilirliği sağlayabileceğini göstermektedir. 

English abstract: Increasing green energy production is not only an environmental, but also an economic and strategic advantage by reducing carbon emissions. Current studies have been carried out on these topics. In this article, the electricity exports of the mentioned countries between 2017-2023 are analyzed and empirical analyzes are made using the indices of trade balance, revealed comparative advantage, relative trade advantage, relative export advantage and relative import advantage. The data source used is the International Trade Center. The results of the research show that diversification in the energy sector and the development of renewable energy sources are of strategic importance for the mentioned countries. Increasing the production of electricity from green sources in Kazakhstan, Turkmenistan and Uzbekistan creates the opportunity to access wider markets than the existing ones. As a result of the analysis, it was revealed that Uzbekistan and Turkmenistan have a competitive advantage. The results show that increasing the production of green energy can strengthen the position of the countries in question in the regional and global markets and ensure the sustainability of electricity exports.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了2017-2023年间哈萨克斯坦、土库曼斯坦和乌兹别克斯坦的电力出口情况，通过贸易平衡、比较优势等指标分析，发现绿色能源生产对这些国家具有经济和战略意义。
AI.research_question: 绿色能源生产如何影响哈萨克斯坦、土库曼斯坦和乌兹别克斯坦的电力出口竞争力？
AI.motivation: 绿色能源不仅能减少碳排放，还能带来经济和战略优势，但目前相关研究较少。
AI.theoretical_framework: 贸易平衡、比较优势理论、相对贸易优势指数等。
AI.method: 使用国际贸易中心的数据，通过实证分析贸易平衡、比较优势等指标。
AI.findings: 乌兹别克斯坦和土库曼斯坦在绿色能源领域具有竞争优势，绿色能源生产能帮助这些国家拓展市场。
AI.theory_contributions: 丰富了绿色能源与贸易竞争力关系的理论研究。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者提供了绿色能源发展对电力出口竞争力的实证支持。

title: ESG as a Mitigator of Oil Volatility Risk
affiliations: University of Essex - Essex Business School, Audencia Business School, University of Essex - Essex Business School and Audencia Business School

detail.title: ESG as a Mitigator of Oil Volatility Risk
detail.abstract: ESG activities are a forward-looking measure to prevent risks from negative externalities. Linking ESG scores with the crude oil market, we assess their mitigating effect on returns during periods of rising oil price volatility. We examine the interplay between ESG scores and crude oil volatility’s impact on returns. Interestingly, this interaction transforms ESG into an insurance-like hedge, protecting returns as volatility increases. Notably, we identify a pivotal turning point at relatively low volatility levels. Below this threshold, ESG activities lack effectiveness, but when volatility surpasses it, their hedging power becomes pronounced. This effect intensifies as volatility rises, rewarding ESG leaders more significantly. Our sectoral and quantile analyses corroborate these findings. Overall, our findings support the role of ESG activities as a “safe haven” in times of financial turmoil, focusing its contribution to the interplay between ESG and oil volatility on periods of heightened uncertainty in the crude oil market.

AI.tldr: ESG活动通过降低原油市场波动对回报的负面影响，在高波动时期发挥类似保险的对冲作用。研究发现，ESG的避险效果在波动超过特定阈值后显著增强。
AI.research_question: ESG评分如何影响原油市场波动对回报的负面影响？
AI.motivation: 探讨ESG活动在高波动时期的对冲作用，验证其作为“避风港”的潜力。
AI.theoretical_framework: ESG活动与负外部性风险预防理论、市场波动与回报关系理论。
AI.method: 结合ESG评分与原油市场数据，分析波动与回报的关系，并通过分位数和行业分析验证。
AI.findings: ESG在高波动时期具有对冲作用，效果在波动超过阈值后显著增强。
AI.theory_contributions: 验证ESG活动作为“避风港”的理论基础，扩展了ESG与市场波动关系的研究。
AI.practical_contributions: 为投资者在高波动时期利用ESG活动对冲风险提供实践指导。
