reference: IIC (International Review of Intellectual Property and Competition Law) vol. 56 (2025), forthcoming November (issue 10)
title: Generative AI and the Scope of EU Copyright Law: A Doctrinal Analysis in Light of C-250/25
affiliations: Leibniz University Hannover and Universitat Pompeu Fabra - Department of Law

detail.title: Generative AI and the Scope of EU Copyright Law: A Doctrinal Analysis in Light of C-250/25

publicationDetails.detailsText: IIC (International Review of Intellectual Property and Competition Law) vol. 56 (2025), forthcoming November (issue 10)

detail.abstract: This article offers a doctrinal analysis of the copyright implications raised by Like Company v. Google Ireland (C-250/25), the first case to bring generative AI before the CJEU. It examines whether the training and output of systems like Gemini infringe exclusive rights under EU copyright law. We argue that AI model training may involve acts of reproduction under Article 2 of the InfoSoc Directive, while the dissemination of AI-generated outputsespecially through public interfaces-may trigger the right of communication to the public under Article 3. Particular concerns arise when protected content is recognisably reproduced or when AI outputs serve as functional substitutes for original works, thereby affecting the normal exploitation of those works. While not a formal infringement criterion, such functional substitution is relevant in assessing the application of exceptions and compliance with the three-step test. The paper also challenges the applicability of the text and data mining exception to generative uses, highlighting its incompatibility with the limitations imposed by the three-step test. Ultimately, the analysis supports a technologically neutral, rights-based interpretation that safeguards the economic viability of creative production in the algorithmic age.

AI.tldr: 本文对生成式AI在欧盟版权法中的影响进行了法律分析，探讨了AI模型训练和输出是否侵犯版权。
AI.research_question: 生成式AI的训练和输出是否侵犯欧盟版权法中的专有权？
AI.motivation: 随着生成式AI的普及，其版权问题成为法律争议焦点，需明确其法律边界。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于欧盟《信息社会指令》第2条和第3条，分析AI训练和输出的版权问题。
AI.method: 采用法律教义分析方法，结合案例研究（Like Company v. Google Ireland）。
AI.findings: AI训练可能涉及复制权，输出可能触发公众传播权；功能替代性影响版权例外适用。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出技术中立的权利解释框架，支持算法时代的创意经济可持续性。
AI.practical_contributions: 为立法者和企业提供AI版权合规的参考，避免法律风险。

title: Athens, Rome, and the Political Economy of Ancient Assemblies
affiliations: University of Southern California - Marshall School of Business

detail.title: Athens, Rome, and the Political Economy of Ancient Assemblies
detail.abstract: Citizen assemblies were the core institution of the democracies of the ancient Mediterranean world. Assemblies had the power to make laws and elect magistrates. These assemblies have been widely criticized by both ancient and modern observers for making poor decisions, but the reasons they would have done so are not well understood. This paper develops a public choice model of ancient assemblies to illuminate the challenges they faced and explain why their decisions may not have enjoyed popular support. The model assumes that policy con licts stem from different preferences between urban and rural citizens, and that voting was more costly for rural than urban citizens because of travel costs. In this framework, ancient assemblies faced a structural challenge of preventing urban masses from dominating the much more numerous citizens in the countryside. The model provides a method to quantify the amount of policy distortion compared to perfect majority rule. I analyze different institutions that ancient democracies used to manage the representation problem, in particular, Athens' program to pay citizens to attend, and Rome's use of a unique group voting system.

AI.tldr: 本文通过公共选择模型分析古代公民大会的决策问题，揭示城乡偏好差异及投票成本导致的结构性挑战，并量化政策扭曲程度。
AI.research_question: 为什么古代公民大会的决策可能不受民众支持？
AI.motivation: 古代公民大会作为民主核心机构常被批评决策不佳，但其原因尚不明确。
AI.theoretical_framework: 公共选择理论，城乡偏好差异及投票成本模型。
AI.method: 构建公共选择模型，量化政策扭曲，分析雅典和罗马的制度设计。
AI.findings: 城乡投票成本差异导致城市群体主导决策，政策扭曲显著；雅典的付费出席和罗马的群体投票制度部分缓解了问题。
AI.theory_contributions: 为古代民主决策提供新的理论解释框架。
AI.practical_contributions: 对现代民主制度设计（如代表性问题）具有借鉴意义。

title: The Lived Experiences of Non-Working Mothers in the Women’S Empowerment Program of a Catholic Higher Education Institution
affiliations: Saint Louis University, affiliation not provided to SSRN, Saint Louis University, Saint Louis University, Saint Louis University, Saint Louis University, Saint Louis University, Saint Louis University, Saint Louis University, Saint Louis University and Saint Louis University

detail.title: The Lived Experiences of Non-Working Mothers in the Women’S Empowerment Program of a Catholic Higher Education Institution
detail.abstract: This study systematically examines how women’s empowerment programs have changed the current situation of non-working mothers in a Catholic Higher Education Institution. It addresses how empowerment initiatives impact their economic independence, personal growth, and social participation. The research highlights that access to livelihood training, skills development, and supportive community networks significantly improved the mothers’ financial stability, self-confidence, and leadership within their families and communities. It concludes that empowerment programs not only transform the lives of marginalized women but also contribute to broader community development and inclusive growth. The study underscores the role of empowerment initiatives in promoting gender equality and enhancing the visibility of non-working mothers, particularly in areas connected to tourism and sustainable economic opportunities.

AI.tldr: 本研究系统分析了女性赋权项目如何改变天主教高等教育机构中非工作母亲的现状，重点关注经济独立、个人成长和社会参与的影响。研究发现，生计培训、技能发展和社区支持网络显著提升了母亲的财务稳定性、自信心及家庭和社区领导力。
AI.research_question: 女性赋权项目如何影响天主教高等教育机构中非工作母亲的经济独立、个人成长和社会参与？
AI.motivation: 探讨赋权项目对边缘化女性及其社区发展的潜在影响，促进性别平等和包容性增长。
AI.theoretical_framework: 女性赋权理论、社会资本理论、性别平等理论。
AI.method: 系统研究，可能包括定性或定量数据分析。
AI.findings: 赋权项目显著提升了非工作母亲的财务稳定性、自信心和领导力，并促进了社区发展。
AI.theory_contributions: 丰富了女性赋权和社会资本理论在高等教育机构中的应用。
AI.practical_contributions: 为设计和实施赋权项目提供了实践指导，促进性别平等和社区发展。

title: New Evidence on the Impact of Energy Poverty on Industrial Performance in Africa
affiliations: Université de Bourgogne and United Nations Economic Commission for Africa

detail.title: New Evidence on the Impact of Energy Poverty on Industrial Performance in Africa
detail.abstract: Industrialisation is essential for Africa’s long-term development, offering a pathway to economic diversification, employment generation, and resilience to external shocks. Given the continent’s demographic and structural challenges, transitioning to higher value-added, technologically advanced industries is a necessity. However, energy poverty remains a major obstacle. As energy is critical to all stages of industrial production, the lack of reliable, affordable, and sustainable electricity constrains industrial growth. Against this backdrop, this study analyses the effects of energy poverty on industrial performance across 33 African countries over the period 1996–2020, using the System Generalized Method of Moments (SGMM) approach and a new Index, the Competitive Industrial Performance (CIP). Through a series of robustness checks, the results indicate that reducing energy poverty has a positive and statistically significant impact on industrial performance in Africa. Moreover, this study highlights the mediating role of human capital, financial development, and income level in the relationship between energy poverty and industrial performance. Furthermore, the findings reveal that reducing energy poverty enhances the capacity for industrial development, with significant impacts on the industrial sector and structural transformation. These results re-affirm the importance for African countries to improve the accessibility and availability of energy to support industrialisation and economic development.

AI.tldr: 本研究分析了1996-2020年间非洲33个国家的能源贫困对工业绩效的影响，发现减少能源贫困对工业绩效有显著正面影响，并强调了人力资本、金融发展和收入水平的中介作用。
AI.research_question: 能源贫困如何影响非洲国家的工业绩效？
AI.motivation: 非洲工业化对经济多元化和就业至关重要，但能源贫困是主要障碍，研究其影响有助于政策制定。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于能源贫困与工业绩效的关系理论，结合人力资本、金融发展和收入水平的中介作用。
AI.method: 采用系统广义矩估计（SGMM）方法和竞争性工业绩效指数（CIP）进行分析。
AI.findings: 减少能源贫困对工业绩效有显著正面影响，且人力资本、金融发展和收入水平起中介作用。
AI.theory_contributions: 丰富了能源贫困与工业绩效关系的理论，强调了中介变量的作用。
AI.practical_contributions: 为非洲国家提供了改善能源可及性和可用性以支持工业化的政策依据。

title: Cross-Sectional Learning and Inference for the Stochastic Discount Factor
affiliations: Hong Kong University of Science & Technology (HKUST) - Department of Finance, University of Macau, Hong Kong University of Science & Technology (HKUST), Dept of ISOM and Dept of Finance, Hong Kong University of Science & Technology (HKUST) - Department of Information Systems, Business Statistics and Operations Management and Hong Kong University of Science & Technology (HKUST) - Department of Information Systems, Business Statistics and Operations Management

detail.title: Cross-Sectional Learning and Inference for the Stochastic Discount Factor
detail.abstract: We develop a statistical learning framework for constructing the stochastic discount factor (SDF) portfolio. To address the dimensionality challenge, we extend the MAXSER method (Ao et al., 2019) to allow for N >> T ; prove that it surely screens for useful characteristics; and establish asymptotic normality for the SDF loading estimates. Using 153 characteristics returns from cross-sectional regressions (Fama and French, 2020), our framework not only constructs an SDF with a high out-of sample Sharpe ratio that successfully prices the cross-section of expected returns, but also allows us to identify key characteristic themes and test the significance of their contributions.

AI.tldr: 本文开发了一种统计学习框架，用于构建随机折现因子（SDF）投资组合。通过扩展MAXSER方法（Ao等人，2019）以解决高维度问题，证明了其能够筛选有用特征，并建立了SDF载荷估计的渐近正态性。基于153个特征收益（Fama和French，2020），该框架不仅构建了具有高样本外夏普比率的SDF，还识别了关键特征主题并检验了其贡献的显著性。
AI.research_question: 如何在高维度（N >> T）情况下构建有效的随机折现因子（SDF）投资组合？
AI.motivation: 解决高维度数据下构建SDF投资组合的挑战，并验证特征筛选方法的有效性。
AI.theoretical_framework: 扩展MAXSER方法（Ao等人，2019），证明其在高维度情况下的特征筛选能力，并建立SDF载荷估计的渐近正态性。
AI.method: 统计学习框架，结合153个特征收益数据（Fama和French，2020），进行交叉验证和特征筛选。
AI.findings: 构建的SDF具有高样本外夏普比率，并能有效定价预期收益的横截面；同时识别了关键特征主题并验证了其贡献的显著性。
AI.theory_contributions: 扩展了MAXSER方法在高维度下的应用，并提供了SDF载荷估计的理论保证。
AI.practical_contributions: 为投资组合构建提供了实用的统计学习框架，能够筛选关键特征并优化投资策略。

title: Spatial Variability of Soil Hydraulic Properties and its Effect on Irrigation Outcomes in Rwandan Hillside Agriculture
affiliations: affiliation not provided to SSRN, affiliation not provided to SSRN, affiliation not provided to SSRN, affiliation not provided to SSRN and affiliation not provided to SSRN

detail.title: Spatial Variability of Soil Hydraulic Properties and its Effect on Irrigation Outcomes in Rwandan Hillside Agriculture
detail.abstract: Smallholder hillside agriculture in Rwanda faces persistent challenges of low productivity, often linked to suboptimal water management. Despite major investments in irrigation infrastructure, uniform irrigation practices commonly applied at the cooperative level fail to account for significant spatial variability in soil properties, resulting in inefficient water use and crop water stress. This study investigates the extent of soil heterogeneity within a 10-hectare agricultural cooperative in Bugesera District, Rwanda, and evaluates its implications for irrigation performance. Soil classification and infiltration measurements were conducted at 27 georeferenced points, followed by infiltration modeling using Horton’s equation. A one-dimensional soil water balance model, based on FAO-56 principles, simulated soil moisture dynamics under the existing irrigation regime of weekly 25 mm applications for a 10-week bean-growing season. Results revealed pronounced variability in soil texture and infiltration rates, ranging from high-permeability gravels to low-infiltration clayey soils. Under uniform irrigation, coarse soils exhibited frequent water stress (12 days) due to rapid percolation losses (67.9 mm), whereas fine-textured soils experienced severe stress (58 days) as 71% of applied water was lost as runoff. In contrast, silty sand provided the most balanced outcome with zero stress and minimal losses (14.2 mm runoff, 22.4 mm percolation). These findings demonstrate that irrigation uniformity across heterogeneous soils compromises both water use efficiency and crop performance. Site-specific strategies such as adjusting irrigation frequency, application rates, and nutrient management to local soil properties are essential to enhance water productivity and sustainability in Rwandan hillside farming systems.

AI.tldr: 卢旺达小农户山坡农业因土壤空间异质性导致灌溉效率低下，研究表明需因地制宜调整灌溉策略以提高水资源利用效率和作物表现。
AI.research_question: 卢旺达Bugesera地区10公顷农业合作社的土壤异质性如何影响灌溉性能？
AI.motivation: 尽管灌溉基础设施投资巨大，但统一的灌溉实践未能考虑土壤空间变异性，导致水资源浪费和作物水分胁迫。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于FAO-56原则的土壤水平衡模型和Horton方程渗透模型。
AI.method: 在27个地理参考点进行土壤分类和渗透测量，模拟10周豆类生长季的土壤水分动态。
AI.findings: 土壤质地和渗透率差异显著，均匀灌溉导致粗质土壤水分胁迫12天，细质土壤胁迫58天，而粉砂壤表现最佳。
AI.theory_contributions: 揭示了土壤异质性对灌溉性能的影响，强调了因地制宜灌溉策略的理论必要性。
AI.practical_contributions: 建议根据土壤特性调整灌溉频率、施水量和养分管理，以提高卢旺达山坡农业的水资源生产力和可持续性。

title: Understanding Electric Vehicle Adoption: The Role of Information Frictions and Heterogeneous Beliefs
affiliations: Leibniz Institute for Financial Research SAFE

detail.title: Understanding Electric Vehicle Adoption: The Role of Information Frictions and Heterogeneous Beliefs

declarations.funderStatement: I would like to acknowledge funding provided by the Leibniz association under the project Stranded Assets, Financial Constraints, and the Distributional Impacts of Climate Policy (FAIRCLIP), as well as funding provided by the SAFE Experiment fund.

publicationDetails.journalName: Leibniz Institute for Financial Research SAFE Working Paper Series

detail.abstract: In 2023, the transportation sector in Europe contributed 25% of CO2 emissions, with almost no reduction since 2010. Despite government policies promoting decarbonization, public adoption of electric vehicles (EVs) remains limited. This study, involving 5,500 German participants from a pre-registered survey and experiment, identifies information frictions and mixed beliefs about EV sustainability as key barriers. Two treatments-highlighting EVs' environmental benefits and public policies-both increased participants' likelihood of choosing an EV, but only the environmental treatment raised willingness to pay more. The findings underscore the need for clear, accurate information to complement policy efforts, reducing disinformation and amplifying the impact of initiatives to meet climate goals.

AI.tldr: 2023年欧洲交通部门占二氧化碳排放量的25%，自2010年以来几乎没有减少。尽管政府推动脱碳政策，但公众对电动汽车（EV）的接受度仍然有限。本研究通过5500名德国参与者的调查和实验，发现信息摩擦和对EV可持续性的混合信念是主要障碍。两种干预措施（强调EV的环境效益和公共政策）均提高了选择EV的可能性，但只有环境干预提高了支付意愿。研究强调需要清晰准确的信息以补充政策努力，减少错误信息并扩大倡议的影响力以实现气候目标。
AI.research_question: 信息摩擦和混合信念如何影响公众对电动汽车的接受度？
AI.motivation: 欧洲交通部门碳排放居高不下，而电动汽车的推广进展缓慢，亟需研究其背后的障碍。
AI.theoretical_framework: 信息摩擦理论、行为经济学中的信念与决策理论。
AI.method: 预注册调查和实验，涉及5500名德国参与者，采用两种干预措施（环境效益和公共政策）。
AI.findings: 两种干预措施均提高了选择EV的可能性，但只有环境干预提高了支付意愿。
AI.theory_contributions: 揭示了信息摩擦和信念在EV接受度中的关键作用。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者提供了通过信息干预提升EV接受度的具体策略。

title: Collusion Through Market Sharing Agreements: Evidence from Quebec's Road Paving Market
affiliations: affiliation not provided to SSRN

detail.title: Collusion Through Market Sharing Agreements: Evidence from Quebec's Road Paving Market
detail.abstract: I study a case of a market sharing agreement between the two largest firms bidding in road paving procurement auctions in Quebec between 2007 and 2015. The police investigation into collusion in the Quebec construction industry launched in October 2009 marked the end of this cartel. After this date, the two colluding firms (i) were more likely to bid in the same auction, and (ii) submitted significantly lower bids when they competed in the same auction. I develop a structural model of entry and bidding in auctions to show that the firms' coordinated avoidance of competing against each other in an auction is associated with higher procurement costs.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了2007年至2015年间魁北克道路铺设采购拍卖中两家最大公司之间的市场共享协议案例。2009年10月警方对魁北克建筑行业勾结行为的调查标志着该卡特尔的终结。此后，两家勾结公司更可能在同一次拍卖中竞标，且在同一拍卖中提交的标书显著降低。通过开发拍卖进入和投标的结构模型，研究表明公司协调避免在同一拍卖中竞争与更高的采购成本相关。
AI.research_question: 两家公司在魁北克道路铺设采购拍卖中的市场共享协议如何影响其竞标行为和采购成本？
AI.motivation: 研究动机是揭示市场共享协议对竞标行为和采购成本的影响，为反垄断政策提供实证依据。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于拍卖理论和卡特尔行为的经济学理论。
AI.method: 采用结构模型分析拍卖中的进入和投标行为。
AI.findings: 研究发现，两家公司在卡特尔终结后更频繁地在同一次拍卖中竞标，且标书价格显著降低，协调避免竞争导致更高的采购成本。
AI.theory_contributions: 为拍卖理论和卡特尔行为研究提供了新的实证证据。
AI.practical_contributions: 研究结果为反垄断政策制定提供了参考，强调了打击市场共享协议的重要性。

title: Price Competition and Cooperation on Sustainable Investments1
affiliations: Purdue University - Krannert School of Management, University of Tokyo, Graduate School of Economics and University of Aberdeen

detail.title: Price Competition and Cooperation on Sustainable Investments1
detail.abstract: Competition policy is increasingly employed to orchestrate cooperative investment agreements in industries. This paper investigates how potential cooperation between firms on corporate social responsibility (CSR) investments affects price competition. The experiment implements communication among sellers in some treatments during the investment stage, using free-form chat or more restrictive messages focused on the CSR investment decision. These alternative communication treatments act as a proxy for the competition authorities’ ability to monitor and scrutinize firms’ cooperative investment agreements. Treatments also vary costs and demand so that either investment or noninvestment is a profit-maximizing strategy conditional on noncooperative pricing. The experiment identifies the causal impact of investment on pricing, and how cooperative CSR affects welfare in imperfectly competitive markets. Experimental results reveal that investment rates are significantly lower with rich communication than in more limited communication treatments. Moreover, prices and firm profits tend to be higher when firms can freely exchange information, at the cost of lower consumer welfare. There is also evidence of market conditions leading to lower prices with successful investment.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了企业间在CSR投资上的潜在合作如何影响价格竞争，并通过实验分析了不同沟通方式对投资和定价的影响。
AI.research_question: 企业间在CSR投资上的潜在合作如何影响价格竞争？
AI.motivation: 竞争政策越来越多地被用于协调行业中的合作投资协议，因此需要研究这种合作对市场竞争的影响。
AI.theoretical_framework: 本文基于不完全竞争市场的理论框架，探讨CSR投资与价格竞争的关系。
AI.method: 通过实验设计，采用自由聊天或限制性信息两种沟通方式，模拟竞争当局对合作投资协议的监控能力。
AI.findings: 实验结果显示，丰富沟通下的投资率显著低于限制性沟通；自由信息交换导致价格和利润上升，但消费者福利下降。
AI.theory_contributions: 揭示了CSR合作对不完全竞争市场中定价和福利的因果影响。
AI.practical_contributions: 为竞争政策制定者提供了关于企业合作投资协议监管的实际建议。

title: Global Production Networks and Imperfect Competition
affiliations: City University of Hong Kong, University College London - Department of Economics, University College London - Department of Economics and Technical University Darmstadt

detail.title: Global Production Networks and Imperfect Competition
detail.abstract: How do global production networks and market structure interact to shape the gains from trade and competition policy? We develop a quantifiable model with two-sided firm heterogeneity, matching frictions, and imperfect competition. More productive buyers match with more suppliers, which spurs tougher competition, lowers input costs, and raises profits. Reduced-form evidence confirms that larger French and Chilean firms import higher quantities at lower prices as more Chinese suppliers enter, and that suppliers charge diversified buyers lower markups. We estimate the model by extending recent methods for combinatorial discrete-choice problems. Counterfactuals reveal that entry upstream benefits primarily high-productivity buyers, while lower trade or matching costs favor mid-productivity firms. Moreover, the interaction between endogenous networks and markups significantly amplifies the welfare gains from entry upstream, as well as from packaging trade liberalization with reductions in matching or entry costs.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了全球生产网络和市场结构如何相互作用以影响贸易和竞争政策的收益。通过开发一个可量化的模型，结合双边企业异质性、匹配摩擦和不完全竞争，研究发现高生产力买家与更多供应商匹配，从而加剧竞争、降低投入成本并提高利润。实证证据支持了模型结论，并通过反事实分析揭示了上游进入和高生产力买家的收益关系。
AI.research_question: 全球生产网络和市场结构如何相互作用以影响贸易和竞争政策的收益？
AI.motivation: 探讨贸易和竞争政策收益的驱动因素，尤其是生产网络和市场结构的交互作用。
AI.theoretical_framework: 双边企业异质性、匹配摩擦、不完全竞争理论。
AI.method: 开发可量化模型，结合实证证据（法国和智利企业数据）和反事实分析。
AI.findings: 高生产力买家与更多供应商匹配，加剧竞争、降低投入成本并提高利润；上游进入主要惠及高生产力买家。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了结合生产网络和市场结构的量化模型，揭示了匹配和竞争对贸易收益的影响。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者提供了贸易自由化与降低匹配或进入成本相结合的优化建议。

title: Oligopolies in Trade and Transportation: Implications for the Gains from Trade
affiliations: Boston College, Bank of Italy, Boston College and University of Warwick

detail.title: Oligopolies in Trade and Transportation: Implications for the Gains from Trade
detail.abstract: We study how the interplay between oligopoly in the transportation industry and oligopsony power retained by non-atomistic importers affects the transmission of trade policy. Using Chilean customs data, we document strong concentration among carriers and importers and show that freight prices are determined through bilateral bargaining under two-sided market power. We estimate a trade model that endogenizes transportation costs by embedding oligopoly and oligopsony in the transport sector, along with bilateral bargaining. We find sizable carrier markups, partially offset by importer bargaining power. Embedding this mechanism into a quantitative trade model, we find that the endogenous response of transportation costs reduces the welfare cost of tariffs by 50% compared to the standard case of iceberg trade costs. This effect is primarily driven by decreasing returns to scale in carriers’ supply. Bargaining, in turn, plays a central role in shaping price levels and market allocations in the transportation sector.

AI.tldr: 研究运输行业寡头垄断与非原子化进口商的买方垄断权力如何影响贸易政策的传导。通过智利海关数据，发现运输和进口商高度集中，运价由双边谈判决定。模型估计显示运输成本内生响应显著降低关税的福利成本。
AI.research_question: 运输行业的寡头垄断与进口商的买方垄断如何影响贸易政策的传导？
AI.motivation: 探讨运输行业市场结构对贸易政策效果的影响，填补现有研究中运输成本内生化的空白。
AI.theoretical_framework: 寡头垄断与买方垄断理论、双边谈判理论、贸易模型。
AI.method: 使用智利海关数据，构建内生运输成本的贸易模型，嵌入寡头垄断与买方垄断及双边谈判机制。
AI.findings: 运输成本的内生响应使关税的福利成本降低50%，主要源于运输供给的规模报酬递减；双边谈判对运价和市场分配起关键作用。
AI.theory_contributions: 将运输行业市场结构内生化为贸易模型，扩展了贸易政策的分析框架。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者提供了运输市场结构对贸易政策效果的新视角，建议关注运输行业的市场力量。

title: Water Security and Human Development: The Role of Size, Footprint and Governance
affiliations: Grenoble Ecole de Management, affiliation not provided to SSRN and University of Geneva

detail.title: Water Security and Human Development: The Role of Size, Footprint and Governance
detail.abstract: The latest planetary boundaries assessment underscores that freshwater systems are facing escalating risks. At the same time, they remain a priority on the political agenda, as reflected in the Sustainable Development Goals. Water security offers a comprehensive framework for disentangling the complex relationships between freshwater resources and human development.WS encompasses economic, environmental, and hazard dimensions, yet existing measurement approaches suffer from heterogeneity, limited comparability, and poor temporal coverage. This paper advances WS research in three ways. First, we present an original, reproducible global WS assessment at 0.5°×0.5° resolution from 2003–2019, integrating Earth observations and statistical data to capture multidimensional risks and resources. Second, we apply both weak and strong sustainability frameworks to WS, revealing substantial discrepancies in estimated security levels and threat areas, with weak sustainability systematically overestimating WS. Third, we examine how economic development and governance interact with WS at the national scale, distinguishing size and intensity effects and identifying institutional conditions that shape outcomes. Our analysis reveals that the weak sustainability approach systematically overestimates both the quality and progression of WS when compared with the strong sustainability approach, a discrepancy primarily attributable to the underlying embeddedness assumption. The mechanisms analysis highlight the non-linearities linking economic and political development to WS levels.

AI.tldr: 本文通过全球水安全评估，揭示了弱可持续性框架高估水安全的问题，并探讨了经济发展与治理对水安全的影响。
AI.research_question: 如何通过多维数据和可持续性框架评估全球水安全，并分析其与经济发展和治理的关系？
AI.motivation: 淡水系统面临日益严重的风险，但现有水安全评估方法存在异质性和可比性不足的问题。
AI.theoretical_framework: 弱可持续性和强可持续性框架。
AI.method: 整合地球观测和统计数据，构建0.5°×0.5°分辨率的全球水安全评估模型（2003-2019）。
AI.findings: 弱可持续性框架系统性高估水安全水平，经济发展与治理对水安全的影响具有非线性特征。
AI.theory_contributions: 揭示了可持续性框架选择对水安全评估结果的影响。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者提供了更准确的水安全评估工具，并强调了治理和经济发展的作用。

title: Optimising Low-Carbon Technology Investment Decisions for Coal Power Plants: A Real Options Approach Incorporating Carbon Market Participation Strategies
affiliations: Guangxi University, Guangxi University, affiliation not provided to SSRN, affiliation not provided to SSRN and affiliation not provided to SSRN

detail.title: Optimising Low-Carbon Technology Investment Decisions for Coal Power Plants: A Real Options Approach Incorporating Carbon Market Participation Strategies
detail.abstract: Against the backdrop of the expanding carbon emission trading markets and heightened external environmental uncertainties, this study develops a decision-making framework to enhance the flexibility of low-carbon technology investments and dynamic risk management for thermal power enterprises. Methodologically, we employ a modified Generalised Autoregressive Conditional Heteroskedasticity (GARCH) model to capture carbon price dynamics and design a carbon market trading behaviour model that integrates carbon financial instruments into firms' low-carbon investment strategies. ​By​ leveraging real options theory, we further develop an intertemporal technology investment decision model and conduct case studies to evaluate corporate investment choices and carbon trading behaviours across various carbon price scenarios. Our findings reveal that the proposed model effectively identifies the nonlinear value of technology investments under uncertainty. Furthermore, the strategic use of carbon financial instruments alleviates cost burdens, mitigates risk exposure during periods of high carbon price volatility, and ensures stable returns under adverse market conditions. The study offers novel perspectives on low-carbon transition pathways for thermal power and other compliance-regulated enterprises, and provides practical references for carbon asset management in thermal power plants.

AI.tldr: 本研究开发了一个决策框架，帮助火电企业在碳交易市场扩展和环境不确定性增加的背景下，提升低碳技术投资的灵活性和动态风险管理能力。通过改进的GARCH模型和碳金融工具，结合实物期权理论，研究发现该模型能有效识别不确定性下的技术投资非线性价值，并缓解碳价波动带来的风险。
AI.research_question: 如何在碳交易市场扩展和环境不确定性增加的背景下，提升火电企业低碳技术投资的灵活性和动态风险管理能力？
AI.motivation: 碳交易市场的扩展和环境不确定性的增加，对火电企业的低碳技术投资和风险管理提出了新的挑战。
AI.theoretical_framework: 改进的GARCH模型、碳市场交易行为模型、实物期权理论。
AI.method: 采用改进的GARCH模型捕捉碳价动态，设计碳市场交易行为模型，结合实物期权理论开发跨期技术投资决策模型，并通过案例研究评估不同碳价情景下的投资选择。
AI.findings: 模型能有效识别不确定性下技术投资的非线性价值；碳金融工具的战略使用可缓解成本负担，降低碳价波动期的风险暴露，并在不利市场条件下确保稳定收益。
AI.theory_contributions: 为火电企业低碳转型路径提供了新的理论视角。
AI.practical_contributions: 为火电企业的碳资产管理提供了实用参考。

title: The Determinants of the Time-Varying Equity Premium
affiliations: Oakland University - School of Business Administration and Oakland University

detail.title: The Determinants of the Time-Varying Equity Premium
detail.abstract: The expected excess return required by investors for taking positions in the stock market is found to be negatively related to changes in real personal consumption expenditures, commodity price inflation, short-term interest rates, and the term spread. However, the ex-ante Sharpe ratio is discovered to have a significantly negative association with only the latter two variables. The overall findings supply support for the hypothesis that the market risk premium is economically countercyclical due primarily to procyclical investor risk tolerance. Measures of financial market volatility and sentiment are found to have no separate impact on the equity premium, and no evidence is found of higher inflation rates increasing risk premiums on the stock market. On the other hand, there is evidence that higher levels of uncertainty relating to geopolitics and economic policy increase the extra return that investors require for risk. The results of this research provide important new evidence supporting consumption asset pricing models, especially those which assume that investors value the resolution of uncertainty and thus require higher discount factors during adversely uncertain economic environments.

AI.tldr: 研究发现，投资者对股票市场的超额回报预期与实际个人消费支出变化、商品价格通胀、短期利率和期限利差呈负相关，而事前夏普比率仅与后两者显著负相关。市场风险溢价主要因投资者风险容忍度的顺周期性而呈现经济逆周期性。金融市场的波动性和情绪对股票溢价无独立影响，且无证据表明高通胀会增加股票市场的风险溢价。然而，地缘政治和经济政策的不确定性会提高投资者对风险回报的要求。研究结果为消费资产定价模型提供了新证据，支持投资者重视不确定性解决并在不利经济环境下要求更高贴现率的假设。
AI.research_question: 投资者对股票市场的超额回报预期与哪些宏观经济变量相关？市场风险溢价是否具有经济逆周期性？
AI.motivation: 探讨市场风险溢价的驱动因素及其与宏观经济变量的关系，验证消费资产定价模型的适用性。
AI.theoretical_framework: 消费资产定价模型，投资者风险容忍度理论，不确定性解决理论。
AI.method: 实证分析，利用宏观经济变量与股票市场数据建立统计模型。
AI.findings: 超额回报预期与实际消费支出、商品价格通胀、短期利率和期限利差负相关；事前夏普比率仅与短期利率和期限利差显著负相关。市场风险溢价具有经济逆周期性，主要由投资者风险容忍度的顺周期性驱动。地缘政治和经济政策不确定性增加风险溢价。
AI.theory_contributions: 支持消费资产定价模型，尤其是投资者重视不确定性解决的假设。
AI.practical_contributions: 为投资者和政策制定者提供了关于市场风险溢价驱动因素的新见解，有助于风险管理策略的制定。

title: How Do Market-Induced Factors Stimulate Environmental Sustainability? A Panel Study of 25 African Economies
affiliations: Cardiff Metropolitan University, Cardiff Metropolitan University and Cardiff Metropolitan University

detail.title: How Do Market-Induced Factors Stimulate Environmental Sustainability? A Panel Study of 25 African Economies
detail.abstract: We examine the relationships between market-induced factors and greenhouse gas (GHG) emissions. Our study applies three decades of data from 25 African economies to a Panel-VECM to assess periodic shifts in GHG emissions, with financial development and renewable energy consumption as the cointegrating vectors. Countries were classified based on their use of hydropower relative to their industrial activities. Our empirical results show a long-run relationship between the cointegrating vectors: financial development and renewable energy acting as stabilising factors in GHG emissions. The results reveal employment in industry, foreign direct investment (FDI), fossil fuel, and industrial performance, which Granger-cause GHG emissions. A rise in one unit of fossil fuel consumption and FDI causes an increase in GHG emissions by 69% and 24%, respectively. This consequence comes from economies with high industrial outputs and labour supply, and use more fossil fuel energy in their production. Following a rigorous normative analysis, we suggest an independent sustainable energy mix to complement the workforce employed and more investments to meet the UN’s sustainable development goals. These new findings and interpretations are relevant for sustainable industrial growth in Africa and highlight the importance of an advanced theoretical foundation for policy interventions.

AI.tldr: 研究探讨了市场因素与温室气体排放的关系，使用25个非洲经济体30年的数据，通过Panel-VECM模型分析，发现金融发展和可再生能源消费是温室气体排放的稳定因素。
AI.research_question: 市场因素（如金融发展、可再生能源消费、工业就业等）如何影响非洲经济体的温室气体排放？
AI.motivation: 为非洲可持续工业增长提供政策建议，支持联合国可持续发展目标。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于Panel-VECM模型，结合金融发展和可再生能源消费作为协整向量。
AI.method: 使用25个非洲经济体30年的数据，通过Panel-VECM模型分析。
AI.findings: 金融发展和可再生能源消费是温室气体排放的稳定因素；化石燃料消费和FDI分别导致排放增加69%和24%。
AI.theory_contributions: 为温室气体排放与市场因素的关系提供了新的理论解释。
AI.practical_contributions: 建议通过独立可持续能源组合和增加投资实现可持续发展目标。

title: When the Market Fears the Law: Strategic Investment Relocation and Resilient Patronage Networks
affiliations: University of California, San Diego (UCSD), School of Economics, Peking University and School of Economics, Nankai University

detail.title: When the Market Fears the Law: Strategic Investment Relocation and Resilient Patronage Networks
detail.abstract: Judicial reforms in authoritarian regimes are typically designed to enhance state capacity, improve market conditions, and promote economic development by curbing local favoritism. This article challenges the top-down model of authoritarian institutional change by showing how firms' strategic adaption to such reforms could offset their intended effects. We examine a major reform in China that centralized court authority at the provincial level. Using a difference-indifferences strategy and a Bartik-style design, we find that the reform does not consistently attract investment by improving market conditions. Instead, politically reliant firms shift investments away from reformed cities and relocate to provincial capitals, where centralized authority creates new space for political patronage. These shifts are most pronounced in provincial capitals with stronger patronage networks, proxied by lower marketization, higher corruption, and closer pre-existing political ties. Moreover, firms engage in strategic co-optation of higher-level officials post-reform, constructing new political ties through revolving-door appointments. These findings highlight a key constraint on legal institutionalization: under weak rule of law, judicial reforms are prone to spatial capture by resilient patronage networks, enabling the continuation of political favoritism and limiting the emergence of rule-based markets.

AI.tldr: 本文挑战了威权体制下司法改革的传统自上而下模型，揭示企业如何通过战略调整抵消改革预期效果。研究发现，中国省级法院集权改革并未吸引投资，反而促使依赖政治关系的企业转移投资至省会城市，形成新的政治庇护空间。
AI.research_question: 威权体制下的司法改革如何影响企业的投资行为？
AI.motivation: 探讨司法改革在威权体制下的实际效果，揭示企业战略行为如何抵消改革预期目标。
AI.theoretical_framework: 威权体制下的制度变迁理论、政治庇护网络理论。
AI.method: 采用双重差分法（DID）和Bartik-style设计，分析中国省级法院集权改革的影响。
AI.findings: 改革未显著改善市场条件吸引投资，反而促使依赖政治关系的企业转移投资至省会城市，形成新的政治庇护空间。
AI.theory_contributions: 揭示了司法改革在弱法治环境下的局限性，补充了威权体制下制度变迁的理论。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者提供了司法改革可能被政治庇护网络捕获的警示，强调法治建设的重要性。

title: Communication Costs, Direct Flights and International Trade
affiliations: University of Tokyo, The University of Hong Kong - University of Hong Kong, HKU Business School, The University of Hong Kong and The University of Hong Kong - University of Hong Kong

detail.title: Communication Costs, Direct Flights and International Trade
detail.abstract: We build a general equilibrium model of endogenous communication, quality control and trade. We derive a structural gravity equation from the model and show that exogenous communication costs increase the probability of product failure and have a more negative impact on trade flows of products with a lower elasticity of substitution. In our empirical application, we focus on direct flight connectedness as a key determinant of communication costs and estimate its causal impact using the derived gravity equation. We overcome the identification challenge using an instrumental variable constructed based on the discontinuity of direct flights at around 6,000-mile distance due to air travel regulations. Moreover, we obtain novel data on international business lawsuits and provide direct evidence that air connectedness reduces the probability of product failure. We combine the empirical estimates and our equilibrium model to quantify the aggregate impact of air connectedness.

AI.tldr: 本文构建了一个关于内生沟通、质量控制和贸易的一般均衡模型，推导出结构性引力方程，并表明外生沟通成本会增加产品失败概率，对替代弹性较低产品的贸易流影响更大。实证中，作者以直飞航班连通性为关键变量，利用引力方程估计其因果效应，并通过工具变量解决识别问题。此外，结合国际商业诉讼数据，直接证明航班连通性降低产品失败概率。最后，结合实证结果与模型量化了航班连通性的总体影响。
AI.research_question: 外生沟通成本如何影响贸易流和产品失败概率？
AI.motivation: 研究沟通成本对贸易和质量控制的影响，填补现有文献空白。
AI.theoretical_framework: 一般均衡模型、结构性引力方程、替代弹性理论。
AI.method: 理论建模、实证分析（工具变量法）、数据结合（航班连通性与商业诉讼数据）。
AI.findings: 沟通成本增加产品失败概率，对低替代弹性产品贸易流负面影响更大；直飞航班连通性显著降低产品失败概率。
AI.theory_contributions: 扩展了沟通成本与贸易关系的理论框架，提出内生沟通与质量控制的均衡模型。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者提供航班连通性对贸易和质量控制的量化依据。

title: Lost Highway: Segmented and Precarious Employment of Migrants in the Green Transition
affiliations: University of Parma - Dipartimento di Scienze Economiche e Aziendali, Gran Sasso Science Institute (GSSI), University of Parma and Parma University, Department of Economics and Management

detail.title: Lost Highway: Segmented and Precarious Employment of Migrants in the Green Transition
detail.abstract: The need to achieve a safe and just ecological transition is a key target of European policy makers. Green jobs are often presented as key levers to achieve this objective, as they enable the creation of new employment opportunities across a wide spectrum of occupations, including low skill ones. In this paper we investigate if and how these opportunities are seized by one of the most vulnerable segment of the labor force, namely migrants. By relying on detailed administrative data covering more that 12 million contract activations in the Emilia-Romagna Region (Italy) we document that, after controlling for potential confounders, migrants are less likely than natives to find employment in green jobs. Moreover, when they do, they have higher chances to be hired with either a fixed-term or an agency contract. Heterogeneity analysis across industries and occupations reveals that such precarious employment patterns are driven primarily by firm attempts to reduce green costs. These results are rationalized through the lenses of institutional segmentation theory. Related policy implications are discussed.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了欧洲政策目标中生态转型对移民就业的影响，发现移民在绿色工作中的就业机会较少且合同更不稳定，原因在于企业为降低成本而采取的策略。
AI.research_question: 移民在绿色工作中的就业机会是否与本地人不同？如果是，原因是什么？
AI.motivation: 欧洲政策推动生态转型，绿色工作被视为关键杠杆，但移民作为劳动力中最脆弱的群体之一，其就业机会是否公平尚不明确。
AI.theoretical_framework: 制度分割理论。
AI.method: 使用意大利艾米利亚-罗马涅大区超过1200万份合同激活的详细行政数据，控制潜在混杂因素后进行分析。
AI.findings: 移民在绿色工作中的就业机会少于本地人，且更可能签订固定期限或劳务派遣合同；企业为降低绿色成本是主要原因。
AI.theory_contributions: 通过制度分割理论解释了移民在绿色工作中的就业劣势。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者提供了关于如何改善移民在绿色工作中就业公平性的建议。

title: Dilematics of Female Workers in the Garment Industry Towards Family Life and Children'S Education: A Case Study
affiliations: affiliation not provided to SSRN, affiliation not provided to SSRN, affiliation not provided to SSRN, affiliation not provided to SSRN, affiliation not provided to SSRN, affiliation not provided to SSRN, affiliation not provided to SSRN, Jakarta State University, affiliation not provided to SSRN and affiliation not provided to SSRN

detail.title: Dilematics of Female Workers in the Garment Industry Towards Family Life and Children'S Education: A Case Study
detail.abstract: This study examines the challenges faced by women in the garment industry, specifically the tension between economic empowerment and child education. Conducted in rural Bogor, Indonesia, with 240 respondents, the findings show that while garment work offers economic opportunities, it also presents trade-offs. Women often face role conflict, balancing the need to contribute to household income with family responsibilities. The study recommends strategic interventions, including: strict enforcement of labour regulations, particularly maternity leave and anti-harassment policies; investment in accessible childcare and family support systems; strengthening rural education, particularly non-formal education and vocational training; expanding educational assistance, including parenting education and psychosocial support for children; activating community-based mentoring for at-risk students; improving child-friendly infrastructure by local governments; and encouraging corporate social responsibility (CSR) to support workers' children's education and family services

AI.tldr: 本研究探讨了印尼农村博戈尔地区服装业女性在经济赋权与子女教育之间的挑战，发现经济机会与家庭责任之间存在冲突，并提出多项干预建议。
AI.research_question: 服装业女性如何在经济赋权与子女教育之间平衡？
AI.motivation: 揭示服装业女性面临的经济与家庭责任冲突，为政策制定提供依据。
AI.theoretical_framework: 角色冲突理论、经济赋权理论。
AI.method: 对240名印尼农村博戈尔地区的女性进行调查研究。
AI.findings: 服装工作提供经济机会，但女性面临角色冲突，需平衡家庭责任。
AI.theory_contributions: 丰富了角色冲突理论在经济赋权与家庭责任领域的应用。
AI.practical_contributions: 提出多项政策建议，包括加强劳动法规、改善儿童保育和教育支持等。

title: Time Poverty and Disaster Readiness: How Routine Constraints Shaped Hurricane Preparation?
affiliations: University of Florida, University of Florida and University of Florida

detail.title: Time Poverty and Disaster Readiness: How Routine Constraints Shaped Hurricane Preparation?
detail.abstract: Lead time for disaster preparation is experienced differently depending on individuals’ routine time constraints. While prior research has examined the psychological and demographic drivers of disaster preparation, little attention has been paid to the influence of time poverty on people’s ability to act during warning periods. Thus, we conduct an in-depth exploration of time poverty and time use in hurricane preparation, focusing on Florida communities affected by at least one of the 2024 consecutive hurricanes Helene and Milton in the United States. We examined how individuals’ time-related constraints, along with their socio-economic patterns, shape their time use, perceived stress, and preparation behavior in response to hurricane alerts. Through a geographically targeted survey, we collected responses from 1,069 hurricane-affected residents. We analyzed preparation time use, activities, and disruptions to daily routines. Using Latent Class Analysis, we identified five routine time-poverty profiles, including Young Time-Balanced Workers, Time-Rich Non-Workers, Affluent Professionals, Working Overloaded Caregivers, and Strained Low-Income Caregivers. Moderated regression analysis revealed that both overloaded caregivers and time-poor professionals experienced significantly higher stress and were less likely to complete preparations, while respondents with more flexible routines reported less stress. Timely and specific warnings alleviated perceived time scarcity, though this benefit diminished with the onset of the second hurricane. Our findings emphasize that developing targeted early alerts as well as institutional measures, such as flexible work arrangements and support for caregivers, are critical to addressing structural time poverty and improving disaster readiness.

AI.tldr: 本文探讨了时间贫困对飓风准备行为的影响，发现时间约束显著增加了压力并降低了准备完成率，提出了针对性预警和支持措施的建议。
AI.research_question: 时间贫困如何影响个体在飓风预警期间的准备行为？
AI.motivation: 现有研究忽视了时间贫困对灾害准备的影响，本文填补了这一空白。
AI.theoretical_framework: 时间贫困理论、灾害准备行为理论。
AI.method: 地理目标调查（1,069名受访者）、潜在类别分析、调节回归分析。
AI.findings: 时间贫困群体（如超负荷照顾者和时间贫困专业人士）压力更高且准备行为更少；灵活预警可缓解时间稀缺感。
AI.theory_contributions: 扩展了时间贫困在灾害准备领域的理论应用。
AI.practical_contributions: 提出针对性预警和制度支持措施（如灵活工作安排）以提升灾害准备能力。

title: Highway Length Matters: Unequal Racial Impacts of Interstate 10 in New Orleans
affiliations: American University - Department of Public Administration and Policy, affiliation not provided to SSRN and American University

detail.title: Highway Length Matters: Unequal Racial Impacts of Interstate 10 in New Orleans
detail.abstract: Using newly constructed data from historical maps, we exploit variation in interstate length within neighborhoods in New Orleans to document the effect of Interstate 10 on housing outcomes. We show that Black neighborhoods exposed to a longer span of Interstate 10 experienced immediate and persistent declines in occupied housing units, owner-occupied housing units, and median home values. In contrast, White neighborhoods exposed to a longer span of the interstate experienced no significant changes in these housing outcomes. We provide evidence that these findings are due to interstate placement, with routes in Black neighborhoods located closer to the neighborhood center.

AI.tldr: 本文利用历史地图数据，研究新奥尔良州际公路10号对住房结果的影响，发现黑人社区因公路长度增加而住房指标显著下降，而白人社区无显著变化。
AI.research_question: 州际公路10号对不同种族社区的住房结果有何影响？
AI.motivation: 探讨基础设施项目（如州际公路）对不同种族社区的差异化影响。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基础设施对住房市场的影响理论，种族与空间不平等理论。
AI.method: 利用历史地图数据，分析州际公路长度与住房结果的关系。
AI.findings: 黑人社区因公路长度增加，住房指标显著下降；白人社区无显著变化。
AI.theory_contributions: 揭示了基础设施项目对种族社区的差异化影响机制。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者提供关于基础设施规划中种族平等问题的参考。

title: Reconsidering the Relationship between CBI and FIX
affiliations: Texas A&M University Central Texas and University of Essex - Department of Government

detail.title: Reconsidering the Relationship between CBI and FIX
detail.abstract: This research note reconsiders the question of whether central bank independence (CBI) and fixed exchange rates (FIX) function as substitutes or complements. We argue that these monetary institutions have neither served as substitutes nor performed as complements for either inflation control or exchange rate stability. In terms of their substitutability, our statistical evidence shows that while CBI has been used for inflation control, FIX has been more directed towards exchange rate stability using updated datasets with these monetary institutions measured both on a de jure and de facto basis with nearly global country/year coverage from 1970 to 2020. In terms of their complementarity, our results also demonstrate that CBI was not more effective at reducing inflation when paired with greater FIX and FIX was not more effective at promoting exchange rate stability when paired with greater CBI. If anything, both are less effective when paired with the other monetary institution. These results suggest a "third generation" framework for studying CBI and FIX together with a focus on macroeconomic objectives beyond just domestic price stability.

AI.tldr: 本文重新探讨了中央银行独立性（CBI）与固定汇率（FIX）是替代还是互补关系的问题，发现两者既非替代也非互补。
AI.research_question: 中央银行独立性（CBI）与固定汇率（FIX）是替代还是互补关系？
AI.motivation: 研究动机是澄清CBI和FIX在通胀控制和汇率稳定方面的实际作用。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于货币制度与宏观经济目标的理论框架。
AI.method: 使用1970-2020年全球国家/年份的法定和实际数据进行分析。
AI.findings: CBI主要用于通胀控制，FIX主要用于汇率稳定；两者结合时效果反而减弱。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了研究CBI和FIX的“第三代”框架，超越单一价格稳定目标。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者提供了关于货币制度组合效果的实证依据。

title: Pricing Climate Physical Risks in Bond Markets: Can Adaptation Strategies Help? Evidence from China
affiliations: Chengdu University of Information Technology, Southwest Jiaotong University - School of Economics & Management, Chengdu University of Information Technology and Chengdu University of Information Technology

detail.title: Pricing Climate Physical Risks in Bond Markets: Can Adaptation Strategies Help? Evidence from China
detail.abstract: This study examines the impact of climate physical risks on corporate bond issuance pricing and its underlying mechanisms within China's climate environment and institutional context. The findings reveal that climate physical risks increase bond credit spreads through two primary channels: eroding firms' intrinsic value (cash flow volatility and investment inefficiency) and amplifying external pressures (capital rationing, equity market risk spillover, and litigation risks), with more pronounced effects in high-sensitivity sectors such as energy and utilities. Further analysis uncovers a dual-threshold effect (climate physical risk index, CPRI=21.77 and 24.19) in climate risk pricing, demonstrating a dynamic evolution in investor responses from "neglect" to "acute sensitivity" and finally to "marginal adjustment." A multi-layered resilience framework—comprising micro-level corporate climate physical risk disclosures, meso-level supply chain resilience, and macro-level urban adaptation capacity—effectively mitigates climate risk premiums. The study not only advances the theoretical frontier of "climate risks–climate resilience–corporate finance" but also provides empirical evidence for investors to assess climate physical risks, regulators to formulate climate finance policies, and firms to optimize climate risk management.

AI.tldr: 本研究探讨了气候物理风险对中国企业债券发行定价的影响及其机制，发现气候风险通过侵蚀企业内在价值和加剧外部压力增加债券信用利差，并提出多层次韧性框架以降低风险溢价。
AI.research_question: 气候物理风险如何影响中国企业债券发行定价及其机制是什么？
AI.motivation: 中国独特的气候环境和制度背景下，气候物理风险对企业债券定价的影响尚未充分研究。
AI.theoretical_framework: 气候风险与公司金融理论，包括内在价值侵蚀和外部压力放大机制。
AI.method: 实证分析，包括双重门槛效应模型和多层次韧性框架。
AI.findings: 气候物理风险通过现金流波动和投资低效侵蚀企业价值，并通过资本配给、股市风险溢出和诉讼风险加剧外部压力；高敏感行业（如能源和公用事业）影响更显著。
AI.theory_contributions: 推进了“气候风险-气候韧性-公司金融”理论前沿。
AI.practical_contributions: 为投资者评估气候风险、监管机构制定气候金融政策和企业优化风险管理提供实证依据。

title: Super-Long Discount Rates for Insurers in Incomplete Markets with Bond Supply Control
affiliations: Hitotsubashi University - Graduate School of Economics and University of Tokyo - Faculty of Economics

detail.title: Super-Long Discount Rates for Insurers in Incomplete Markets with Bond Supply Control
detail.abstract: This paper develops a multi-agent equilibrium model in an incomplete market setting and derives super-long discount rates for insurance companies, while exogenously incorporating the dynamics of government financing and central bank operations in purchasing government bonds.Specifically, we include dividend-paying securities in the model that represent the market value of outstanding government bonds, categorized by their time to maturity, and consider an optimal consumption and portfolio problem of agents who have different views on fundamental risks and heterogeneous time preferences. Using a convex dual problem approach, we obtain expressions for the equilibrium state price density process. Moreover, we derive the yield curve for discount rates in equilibrium, associating exogenously determined dividend processes with coupon payments from the government bonds categorized by time-to-maturity, which reflect market outstanding notional adjustments.  The main contribution of our study is the incorporation of changes in the supply of government bonds in the secondary market into the incomplete market equilibrium model. This approach enables us to estimate the impact of net supply changes of the government bonds on super-long discount rates, while incorporating the heterogeneous views of agents regarding fundamental risks, represented by Brownian motion.  Finally, we examine how changes in the supply of government bonds impact the pricing of insurance products, including death benefits and pension annuities, through shifts in the super-long discount rates.

AI.tldr: 本文开发了一个不完全市场下的多主体均衡模型，推导出保险公司的超长期贴现率，并外生地纳入政府融资和央行购买政府债券的动态。通过凸对偶问题方法，得到了均衡状态价格密度过程的表达式，并进一步推导出均衡下的贴现率收益率曲线。主要贡献是将二级市场中政府债券供给变化纳入不完全市场均衡模型，从而估计政府债券净供给变化对超长期贴现率的影响。
AI.research_question: 如何在不完全市场中，通过多主体均衡模型估计政府债券供给变化对超长期贴现率的影响？
AI.motivation: 研究政府债券供给变化对金融市场（尤其是保险产品定价）的影响，填补不完全市场均衡模型中政府债券动态的空白。
AI.theoretical_framework: 不完全市场均衡理论、多主体决策模型、凸对偶问题方法、政府债券动态分析。
AI.method: 构建多主体均衡模型，外生纳入政府融资和央行操作动态，使用凸对偶问题方法求解均衡状态价格密度过程和贴现率收益率曲线。
AI.findings: 政府债券供给变化通过影响超长期贴现率，进一步影响保险产品（如死亡给付和养老金年金）的定价。
AI.theory_contributions: 将政府债券供给动态纳入不完全市场均衡模型，扩展了现有理论框架。
AI.practical_contributions: 为保险公司和政府政策制定者提供了超长期贴现率变动的量化工具，有助于优化保险产品定价和政策设计。

title: Scaled Factor Portfolio
affiliations: Xiamen University, Capital University of Economics and Business, Southwestern University of Finance and Economics (SWUFE) and Dongbei University of Finance and Economics

detail.title: Scaled Factor Portfolio
detail.abstract: This paper examines a scaled, mean-variance, factor-investing portfolio strategy in a high-dimension setting. We first scale each factor by its Sharpe ratio and then extract the common principal components (PCs) to construct a factor portfolio. By assigning more weights to factors with higher Sharpe ratios, the scaled PCs incorporate both second-moment information as in traditional principal component analysis and first-moment information from the factor set. By shrinking the cross-section of scaled PCs, the scaled-factor portfolio improves the out-of-sample performance of the mean-variance investor’s problem. The scaled factor portfolio also yields a superior estimated pricing kernel for asset pricing.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了一种在高维环境下基于均值-方差和因子投资的组合策略，通过Sharpe比率缩放因子并提取主成分构建组合，提升了样本外表现和资产定价效果。
AI.research_question: 如何在高维环境下构建一种基于均值-方差和因子投资的优化组合策略？
AI.motivation: 传统主成分分析仅利用二阶矩信息，而忽略了一阶矩信息（如Sharpe比率），本文旨在结合两者以提升组合表现。
AI.theoretical_framework: 均值-方差理论、因子投资理论、主成分分析（PCA）。
AI.method: 通过Sharpe比率缩放因子，提取共同主成分构建组合，并对缩放后的主成分进行截面收缩。
AI.findings: 缩放因子组合显著提升了均值-方差投资者的样本外表现，并提供了更优的资产定价核估计。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了一种结合一阶矩和二阶矩信息的因子组合构建方法，扩展了传统PCA的应用。
AI.practical_contributions: 为投资者提供了一种在高维环境下优化组合表现的实际工具，并改进了资产定价模型。

title: Additivity Property for Distortion Risk Measures of Counter-Monotonic Sums
affiliations: Hunan University

detail.title: Additivity Property for Distortion Risk Measures of Counter-Monotonic Sums

keywords: the Lebesgue-Stieltjes integral representation of distortion risk measures

detail.abstract: Abstract. In this paper, additivity property for any distortion risk measure of sums of two counter-monotonic risks is investigated. Precisely, let (X1,X2) be a pair of random variables and be the counter-monotonic sum of X1 and X2. Based on the Lebesgue-Stieltjes integral representation of distortion risk measures, we will show that under some reasonable conditions about the form of the aggregate loss function there exists for any distortion function g a distortion function gξ such that ρg[S−] = ρgξ[X1]+ρgξ[X2], where gξ is the dual distortion function of gξ. Such an additivity decomposition extends some of the recent work of [2] and [20] from the case of VaR’s and TVaR’s to the case of distortion risk measures.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了两种反单调风险之和的失真风险测度的可加性性质，证明了在一定条件下，存在一个失真函数gξ使得失真风险测度ρg[S−]可以分解为ρgξ[X1]和ρgξ[X2]的和。
AI.research_question: 对于两种反单调风险之和的失真风险测度，是否存在可加性分解？
AI.motivation: 扩展近期关于VaR和TVaR的研究，将失真风险测度的可加性性质推广到更一般的情况。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于Lebesgue-Stieltjes积分表示的失真风险测度理论。
AI.method: 通过数学推导和条件假设，证明失真风险测度的可加性分解。
AI.findings: 在一定条件下，存在失真函数gξ使得失真风险测度ρg[S−]可以分解为ρgξ[X1]和ρgξ[X2]的和。
AI.theory_contributions: 将失真风险测度的可加性性质从VaR和TVaR推广到更一般的失真风险测度。
AI.practical_contributions: 为风险管理中失真风险测度的应用提供了理论支持。

title: Ndc Benchmarking and Actuarial Fairness in Spain's Db Pensions: Retirement, Disability, and Survivor Reversibility
affiliations: University of Valencia - Department of Financial Economics

detail.title: Ndc Benchmarking and Actuarial Fairness in Spain's Db Pensions: Retirement, Disability, and Survivor Reversibility
detail.abstract: We apply an actuarially grounded Notional Defined Contribution (NDC) counterfactual to benchmark Spain’s pay‑as‑you‑go Defined Benefit (DB) pensions using administrative microdata (MCVL, 2015–2023). From observed contribution histories we reconstruct notional capital, price DB liabilities with contingency‑, gender‑ and income‑stratified mortality—adding severity‑ and onset‑adjusted tables for disability—and quantify actuarial fairness via money’s‑worth ratios (MWR), real internal rates of return (IRR), and notional–cost gaps. A unified treatment of retirement, disability, and survivor reversibility employs joint‑life valuation.Results show pervasive actuarial deficits (median MWR > 1). Retirement pensions are generous—especially for women, reflecting longevity—yet the largest imbalances arise in disability, where shorter careers and formula design yield MWRs often between 2 and 5 and double‑digit real IRRs. Disability is the often‑overlooked “elephant in the room” of pension reform debates. Incorporating 52% survivor reversibility materially increases liabilities—more for men given spousal‑age assumptions—while leaving relative generosity patterns largely intact. Returns decrease with contribution length, implying systematic redistribution toward short or fragmented careers. Recent reforms only modestly attenuate these gaps.Findings reveal hidden intra‑ and intergenerational transfers that challenge solvency and transparency when retirement is analyzed in isolation. Policy implications include integrating all contingencies in actuarial oversight, separating contributory from redistributive finance, and accelerating alignment with NDC principles while preserving targeted adequacy instruments.

AI.tldr: 本文通过精算方法比较了西班牙的现收现付制养老金与名义账户制（NDC）的差异，揭示了养老金体系中的隐性赤字和不公平现象，尤其是残疾养老金的高额补贴。
AI.research_question: 如何通过精算方法评估西班牙现收现付制养老金的公平性与可持续性？
AI.motivation: 西班牙养老金体系存在隐性赤字和不透明性，尤其是残疾养老金的高额补贴问题被忽视，需通过精算分析揭示其影响。
AI.theoretical_framework: 名义账户制（NDC）理论、精算公平性评估方法（如金钱价值比MWR、实际内部收益率IRR）。
AI.method: 使用行政微观数据（MCVL, 2015–2023），通过贡献历史重建名义资本，评估养老金负债（包括退休、残疾和遗属养老金），并计算MWR和IRR。
AI.findings: 研究发现养老金体系普遍存在精算赤字（中位数MWR>1），残疾养老金补贴尤为显著（MWR常为2-5，实际IRR达两位数）。遗属养老金的可逆性显著增加负债。
AI.theory_contributions: 揭示了养老金体系中隐性再分配机制，挑战了仅关注退休养老金的传统分析框架。
AI.practical_contributions: 建议将全部风险纳入精算监管，分离缴费与再分配融资，并加速向NDC原则靠拢，同时保留针对性保障工具。

title: Managing Monetary Tradeoffs in Vulnerable Open Economies
affiliations: International Monetary Fund, International Monetary Fund (IMF), International Monetary Fund (IMF), Sveriges Riksbank - Research Division and International Monetary Fund MCMMP

detail.title: Managing Monetary Tradeoffs in Vulnerable Open Economies
detail.abstract: We develop a quantitative New Keynesian model to study monetary tradeoffs in open economies with financial fragilities, limits to FX market arbitrage, and persistent exchange rate passthrough to prices and wages. Our framework allows us to quantify the role of various frictions facing emerging market economies by their adverse welfare implications. We analyze how foreign exchange intervention (FXI) and capital flow management tools (CFMs) can complement traditional interest rate policy in normal times and during crisis episodes. Our analysis points to material benefits of using FXI and CFMs to lean against nonfundamental drivers of capital inflows and outflows, with the bulk of welfare gains coming from stabilization of UIP risk premia rather than from mitigating the consequences of "sudden stops."

AI.tldr: 本文通过构建一个定量的新凯恩斯模型，研究了开放经济体中货币政策在金融脆弱性、外汇市场套利限制以及汇率对价格和工资持续传导背景下的权衡。
AI.research_question: 在开放经济体中，如何通过外汇干预（FXI）和资本流动管理工具（CFMs）补充传统利率政策，以应对金融脆弱性和汇率传导问题？
AI.motivation: 新兴市场经济体面临金融脆弱性、外汇市场套利限制和汇率传导问题，需要量化这些摩擦对福利的负面影响，并探讨FXI和CFMs的作用。
AI.theoretical_framework: 新凯恩斯模型，结合开放经济体的金融脆弱性和汇率传导机制。
AI.method: 构建定量模型，量化摩擦对福利的影响，并分析FXI和CFMs的政策效果。
AI.findings: 使用FXI和CFMs可以有效应对资本流动的非基本面驱动因素，福利增益主要来自稳定无抛补利率平价（UIP）风险溢价，而非缓解“突然停止”的后果。
AI.theory_contributions: 扩展了新凯恩斯模型在开放经济体中的应用，量化了金融摩擦的福利影响。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者提供了FXI和CFMs在正常时期和危机时期的互补性政策工具建议。

title: Longitudinal Housing Recovery Following Hurricane Sandy: A Survival Analysis
affiliations: Texas Tech University, Texas Tech University, University of Waterloo, Texas Tech University, State University of New York (SUNY), Stony Brook and Texas A&M University at Galveston

detail.title: Longitudinal Housing Recovery Following Hurricane Sandy: A Survival Analysis
detail.abstract: This study employed a longitudinal approach to analyze housing recovery following Hurricane Sandy, utilizing survival analysis to assess the time required for property values to return to or exceed their pre-disaster appraised values. Lots’ appraised values before the hurricane and across multiple years, post-disaster, were extracted as proxies for damage severity and recovery progress. The recovery timeline was then linked to household and housing characteristics to determine their significance in long-term recovery. Results indicated that households with higher socioeconomic status and education levels, as well as those residing in older homes, tended to recover more slowly compared to their counterparts. These findings provide critical insights into the factors influencing long-term housing recovery, offering valuable guidance for disaster recovery planning and policymaking at various levels to enhance resilience and equitable recovery outcomes.

AI.tldr: 本研究采用纵向方法分析飓风桑迪后的住房恢复情况，利用生存分析评估房产价值恢复或超过灾前评估值所需时间。研究发现，社会经济地位和教育水平较高的家庭以及居住在较老房屋中的家庭恢复较慢。
AI.research_question: 飓风桑迪后，住房恢复的时间受哪些因素影响？
AI.motivation: 了解住房恢复的长期动态及其影响因素，为灾害恢复规划和政策制定提供依据。
AI.theoretical_framework: 生存分析理论，灾害恢复理论。
AI.method: 纵向研究，利用灾前和灾后多年房产评估值作为代理变量，结合家庭和住房特征进行生存分析。
AI.findings: 社会经济地位和教育水平较高的家庭及居住在较老房屋中的家庭恢复较慢。

title: Love-for-Variety
affiliations: Northwestern University - Department of Economics and HSE University

detail.title: Love-for-Variety
detail.abstract: We study how love-for-variety, -- utility gains from expanding variety of goods --, depends on the demand structure. We define the substitutability and love-for-variety measures, which are functions of the variety of goods. Since homotheticity alone imposes little restriction, we turn to five subclasses of homothetic demand systems, which are pairwise disjoint with the exception of CES. Under the two classes of GM-CES, both measures are constant, and the love-for-variety measure under CES underestimates the true love-for-variety under GM-CES. Under H.S.A., HDIA, and HIIA, we establish i) substitutability is increasing in iff the 2nd law of demand holds; ii) increasing substitutability implies diminishing love-for-variety. iii) the love-for-variety measure under CES overestimates the true love-for-variety under diminishing love-for-variety. We illustrate the implications of these results in a simple Armington-type competitive model of trade and show how biased the estimates of the gains from trade under CES can be.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了商品多样性对消费者效用的影响（即“多样性偏好”）如何依赖于需求结构。通过定义替代性和多样性偏好的度量，并分析五种同质需求子类，研究发现CES模型可能低估或高估多样性偏好的真实影响，进而影响贸易收益的估计。
AI.research_question: 商品多样性对消费者效用的影响如何依赖于需求结构？
AI.motivation: 理解多样性偏好与需求结构的关系，有助于更准确地评估贸易收益和消费者福利。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于同质需求系统的五个子类（GM-CES、H.S.A.、HDIA、HIIA），定义了替代性和多样性偏好的度量。
AI.method: 理论分析，通过定义度量并比较不同需求子类下的结果。
AI.findings: 1. 替代性增加的条件；2. 替代性增加导致多样性偏好递减；3. CES模型可能低估或高估多样性偏好的真实影响。
AI.theory_contributions: 扩展了对多样性偏好与需求结构关系的理论理解，揭示了CES模型的局限性。
AI.practical_contributions: 为贸易收益的准确估计提供了理论支持，避免CES模型的偏差。
